title: Gmail
description:
Gmail is an easy to use email app that saves you time and keeps your messages safe. Get your messages instantly via push notifications, read and respond online & offline, and find any message quickly.
With the Gmail app you get:
‚Ä¢ An organized inbox - Social and promotional messages are sorted into categories so you can read messages from friends and family first.
‚Ä¢ Less spam - Gmail blocks spam before it hits your inbox to keep your account safe and clutter free.
‚Ä¢ 15GB of free storage - You won‚Äôt need to delete messages to save space.
‚Ä¢ Multiple account support - Use both Gmail and non-Gmail addresses (Outlook.com, Yahoo Mail, or any other IMAP/POP email) right from the app.

‚Ä¢ 15GB of free storage - You won‚Äôt need to delete messages to save space.
‚Ä¢ Multiple account support - Use both Gmail and non-Gmail addresses (Outlook.com, Yahoo Mail, or any other IMAP/POP email) right from the app.
summary: Email from Google
recentChanges: ‚Ä¢ Bug fixes and performance improvements.
comments: I am so frustrated with this app!!! It crashes constantly. Every time I try to click a link in my email, it crashes, and sometimes the app does not open. I have been sending reports and messages for weeks now to no avail. I don't want to go through the trouble of closing my email account and go to another service, I JUST WANT YOU TO FIX THE APP!!! Hopefully, SOMEONE will see my post and are kind enough to respond!!!

I use gmail all the time but I noticed on this update before last that it took away the ability to resize images, at this time when we are more isolated from each other it would be good to be able to reduce the size of pictures to share with friends and family. I used to be able to send over 10 pictures at a time and in sequence, now its max 6 and all over the place.... any chance we could have the resize element back??

I love Gmail. But it never deletes my spam when I tell it to. My emails come thru late. I have to pull the screen down to make it sync. Even though I keep my account clear of old emails and constantly delete anything that I'm done reading. I'm still having problems. So I have to uninstall all updates and reinstall the app weekly. Just so it works properly for a few days.

gmail now crashes no matter what fix I apply. Also...I've lost the ability to make this the default, or to default to another email app so I can open my hyperlinks. Every time I click a link it crashes and I never changed my settings. This update is the worst one ever. I'm switching everything off of Chrome, because I live and work by my email. I cannot function! And yet...ALLL of my emails are GMAIL! I want a divorce. After 3 weeks of complaints, you would think someone would get the message.

Something weird has been going on with my gmail Android app for some days. It does not open. Absolutely nothing happens when I click on the App button except a totally blank white screen with only the + sign for new email on the bottom right. I have no idea what to do. Please help me, Gmail is essential for my work. Update: Fixed it by uninstalling and reinstalling all updates. Leaving this review here for the record.

title: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
description:
Be together whenever, with our free* all-in-one communication app, complete with unlimited text, voice, video calling and group video chat features. Easily sync your messages and contacts to your Android phone and connect with anyone, anywhere. 
 
FREE VIDEO CALLS TO STAY CONNECTED
Keep your friends and family close with unlimited live video chatting - like facetime, but works across devices (Android, iOS, etc.). Host group video calls with up to 8 people, with high-quality audio, high definition video, and interactive video features like face filters.  
 
UNLIMITED FREE TEXT & PHONE CALLS 
Skip exchanging phone numbers and simply send a message to your Facebook friends, even if they‚Äôre across the world.  Enjoy high-quality voice and text messaging on mobile, tablet, and desktop. 
 
RECORD AND SEND VOICE AND VIDEO MESSAGES
When text just won't cut it, just hit record and send. Say, sing, show, or shout it out loud.
 
TURN OFF THE LIGHTS IN DARK MODE 
Give your eyes some rest with a sleek new look that darkens the colors of the chat interface. 
 
EXPRESS YOURSELF WITH STICKERS, GIFS, AND EMOJIS 
Use custom stickers to show your creative side. You can even add effects and filters to video calls.
 
SEND FILES, PHOTOS, AND VIDEOS 
There‚Äôs no limit to the number of files you want to share with your friends.
 
SEND MONEY SECURELY AND EASILY (within US only)
Send and receive money from friends in the app by adding your debit card or PayPal account.
 
SHARE YOUR LOCATION
Suggest a meeting spot or tell friends where you are by sharing your location with just a few taps.
 
CHAT WITH BUSINESSES
Easily connect with your favorite businesses to make reservations, get customer support, find deals and more.
 
BRING SMS INTO MESSENGER
No need to open multiple apps to stay in touch. Use one app for SMS and Messenger. 

COMPATABLE ACROSS PLATFORMS 
Chat with friends across an array of devices, like desktop, Portal, and iOS.
 
Privacy Policy: https://www.facebook.com/about/privacy/ 
LEARN MORE about Messenger texting and group video chat at: http://messenger.com (http://messenger.com/)   

* Data rates apply

comments: Since a couple of weeks the direct share link on a Samsung Galaxy S10 does not work any more. It does not get you the option to choose which people to send to. It the application was opened, it basically takes you too it, but if not, absolutely nothing happens. Direct share works with other apps, though!

What's wrong whith this app?! Messages can't be sent on my screen, while others see my messages and it doesn't showing me that. My messages are sent but not delivered or seen. And my chat list isn't loading. It happens to me every day and resetting end reinstalling isn't working. Fix this Facebook. It's annoying. üôÑ It started 3-4 weeks ago.

Text works great. But when I call people it seems like the voice and video calls don't always work here in Cleburne TX. When I call people on the other side of the world it works fine but here in my town the calls don't always go through or get dropped or bad quality. Maybe the internet availability needs improvement in my town.

Messenger recent update is bugged and I have tested it already on all 3 devices of mine, both android and iOS. Whenever I am trying to share something through messenger (be it a YouTube video, a photo, or an audio clip I have recorded in my phone's internal app), it will only pull up the Messenger app as if I am not sharing anything!!

messenger sucks anymore.....have not been able to share and send articles to my friends as I did before, by clicking on share, then messenger and then name used to come up and I would click send next to their name, but will not and has not done for three going on four days today and do not know why! Is there something wrong with messenger? Can you please fix this problem and asap, thanks!

title: Google Voice
description:
Google Voice gives you a phone number for calling, text messaging, and voicemail. It works on smartphones and computers, and syncs across your devices so you can use the app in the office, at home, or on the go.
NOTE: Google Voice only works for personal Google Accounts in the US and G Suite accounts in select markets. Text messaging is not supported in all markets.
  You're in control
  Get spam filtered automatically and block numbers you don‚Äôt want to hear from. Manage your time with personalized settings for forwarding calls, text messages, and voicemail.
  Backed up and searchable
  Calls, text messages, and voicemails are stored and backed up to make it easy for you to search your history.
  Manage messages across devices
  Send and receive individual and group SMS messages from all your devices.
  Your voicemail, transcribed
  Google Voice provides advanced voicemail transcriptions that you can read in the app and/or have sent to your email.
  Save on international calling
  Make international calls at competitive rates without paying extra for international minutes with your mobile carrier.
  Keep in mind:
  ‚Ä¢ Google Voice is currently only available in the US. Google Voice for G Suite users is available in select countries. Check with your administrator for access.
  ‚Ä¢ Calls made using Google Voice for Android can be placed through a Google Voice access number. All access number based calls use the standard minutes from your cell phone plan and may incur costs (e.g. when traveling internationally).

comments: I have been using google voice for a few years now without ANY problems but all of a sudden it stopped working. I cant make/receive calls nor send/receive text messages. I have uninstalled three times in an effort to fix the problem but it's still not working. This is causing a huge disruption for me and there seems to be no technical support.

Usually great, but since the latest update, the notification on my lock screen (and thus also when I unlock) keeps disappearing. It'll show up for a few minutes, but if I don't get to it fast enough or if I don't see it right away, it just goes away. I keep needing to go into the app to make sure I haven't missed texts.

I really appreciate being able to have a second number that I can keep permanently for keeping my personal phone personal. I don't want everyone calling my cellphone; close friends, family etc yes! Business contacts, retail memberships, creditors, not at all. Nothing sucks more when trying to relax than some a-hole blowing up your phone. Got to love Google for this service! @ pthis price this service cannot be beat. Thanks Google Team!! Sincerely, Moe

Cant give it a 5... works great so far, definitely notifies me when I missed a call and it went to voicemail, but I want to either extend the number of "rings" before it goes to voicemail, OR disable the voicemail feature and review my missed calls! Either option would be good, and allow me the time to get to the phone to answer it! I am not so young that it is attached to my hand, and it seems to go to voicemail very quickly. Please advise on either option that I would like to utilize!

I've been using Google voice for a while now. I really enjoy having one phone number for everything. I'm not sure if I'm imagining this but it seems like I don't get very many spam calls to my number which is super nice. The search leaves something to be desired and the chrome plugin no longer works.

title: All Email Access with call screening
description:
All Email Access is an email app for Android that allows you to connect to your multiple email accounts from a single app ‚Äì it also creates a powerful link between mail and phone calls, and identifies callers, with mail options directly from the caller ID screen.

In this fast-moving mobile age, you need quick email login access and better ways to manage your inbox. This easy to use e-mail app simplifies email login and allows you to manage various email accounts with a single click. 

What sets All Email Access apart from other email apps is the smart Caller ID. It identifies callers in real-time, even if the caller isn‚Äôt in your phonebook. The link between calls and emails means you can also easily and instantly send emails to the caller or access your emails directly after the call ends. 

This app will strongly enhance your mobile communication and productivity.

What you get in this app:

- Super easy all email access: Universal email client lets you access all emails in one simple mail app (compatible with a large number of different mobile email providers).
- ID Caller: Each time you receive a call you will see the caller‚Äôs details. 
- Easy email access from the caller ID screen allows you to mail the caller quickly.
- Save contacts: Save unknown incoming contacts with one click after each call.
- Make it your own: You can easily adjust caller ID to your preferences in the app settings.
- Overview of call history: Call log and instant access to your phonebook in the app.
- Dedicated customer support ‚Äì Our dedicated customer support team will ensure you have great functionality from amazing features.

title: Samsung Internet Browser
description:
New Features for you 
* Browser Extensions (Galaxy Store Required)
We introduce general purpose Browser Extensions, such as Mate Translate. These can be installed from the Galaxy Store to bring even more features to the powerful Web Browser. Tap ‚ÄúAdd-ons‚Äù in the menu to learn more.

* Tab Bar for Phone
You can now enable a tab bar beneath the URL bar to see open tabs, like on desktop web browsers. This can be turned on under the "Appearance" menu.

* Video Assistant
Video Assistant is back to support you to enjoy video watching experience more than ever. With the purple floating button, you can easily change to watch as full-screen or popup-screen.

* Customize menu
You can relocate buttons on bottom toolbar as you like. All of buttons in ‚Äòmore‚Äô menu will be the candidates.

* Tab Manager Renewal
Try our newly decorated list-view mode of Tab Manager.

Security & Privacy
Samsung Internet helps you protect your security and privacy while browsing the Internet.

* Smart Anti-Tracking
Intelligently identify domains which have cross-site tracking ability and block storage (cookie) access.

* Protected Browsing
We will warn you before you can view known malicious sites to prevent you from visiting web sites which may try to steal your data.

* Content Blockers
Samsung Internet for Android allows 3rd party apps to provide filters for content blocking, making browsing safer and more streamlined.

Engine Version
We are using Chromium 75 as the browser engine.

The following permissions are required for the app service.
For optional permissions, the default functionality of the service is turned on, but not allowed.

Required permissions
none

Optional permissions
Telephone: Used to check device-unique identification information for app analysis information
Location: Used to provide location-based content requested by the user or location information requested by the webpage in use
Camera: Used to provide webpage shooting function and QR code shooting function
Microphone: Used to provide recording function on webpage
Contacts: Used to get the device account information for cloud sync
Storage: Used to store files when downloading from webpages

If your system software version is lower than Android 6.0, please update the software to configure App permissions.
Previously allowed permissions can be reset on Apps menu in device Settings after software update.

title: Google Chrome: Fast & Secure
description:
Google Chrome is a fast, easy to use, and secure web browser. Designed for Android, Chrome brings you personalized news articles, quick links to your favorite sites, downloads, and Google Search and Google Translate built-in. Download now to enjoy the same Chrome web browser experience you love across all your devices.
        
        Browse fast and type less. Choose from personalized search results that instantly appear as you type and quickly browse previously visited web pages. Fill in forms quickly with Autofill.
        
        Incognito Browsing. Use Incognito mode to browse the internet without saving your history. Browse privately across all your devices.
        
        Sync Chrome Across Devices. When you sign into Chrome, your bookmarks, passwords, and settings will be automatically synced across all your devices. You can seamlessly access all your information from your phone, tablet, or laptop.
        
        All your favorite content, one tap away. Chrome is not just fast for Google Search, but designed so you are one tap away from all your favorite content. You can tap on your favorite news sites or social media directly from the new tab page. Chrome also has the ‚ÄúTap to Search‚Äù- feature on most webpages. You can tap on any word or phrase to start a Google search while still in the page you are enjoying.
        
        Protect your phone with Google Safe Browsing. Chrome has Google Safe Browsing built-in. It keeps your phone safe by showing warnings to you when you attempt to navigate to dangerous sites or download dangerous files.
        
        Fast downloads and view web pages and videos offline Chrome has a dedicated download button, so you can easily download videos, pictures, and entire webpages with just one tap. Chrome also has downloads home right inside Chrome, where you can access all the content you downloaded, even when you are offline.
        
        Google Voice Search. Chrome gives you an actual web browser you can talk to. Use your voice to find answers on-the-go without typing and go hands free. You can browse and navigate quicker using your voice anywhere, anytime.
        
        Google Translate built-in: Quickly translate entire web pages. Chrome has Google Translate built in to help you to translate entire web to your own language with one tap.
        
        Use less mobile data and speed up the web. Turn on Lite mode and use up to 60% less data. Chrome can compress text, images, videos, and websites without lowering the quality.
        
        Smart personalized recommendations. Chrome creates an experience that is tailored to your interests.  On the new tab page, you will find articles that Chrome selected based on your previous browsing history.

recentChanges:
Thanks for choosing Chrome! This release contains the following features, as well as stability and performance improvements:

‚Ä¢ Quieter notifications: You can see fewer notification requests with a new permission option.
‚Ä¢ SameSite cookies: By default, cookies are treated as same-site only.
‚Ä¢ Secure media: Insecure audio and video on secure pages are automatically upgraded to secure connections.
comments: The older versions were simple and easy to use. But, there are things I don't like in this new update. 1. Some gesture controls have been changed. 2. The TABS IN GROUP style seems to be very complex and it is hard to getting used to. 3. Switching between two tabs is not easy like before. So I would be happy if the older layouts are used in the future updates.

I've used this app extensively for years, and I've loved it. Recently, though, they've made a change get in the way you search for images. Once you search by image, and tap, "View more sizes," the following view no longer displays the dimensions for the images. It was a nice touch and one that I really enjoyed, when looking for wallpapers, but now that it's gone, I don't think I'm going to be using this app, anymore.

You need to fix your App. Been getting a lot of error messages for the past month. Apps are often unresponsive and won't open. Not having any of these issues on other Google sponsored browsers like Opera, and none on Bing. Prefer Chrome, but until you get these issues solved I'm switching over to something else. Note I have cleared the cache and data at least 3 or 4 times.

This app is an absolute slap in the face to the user. At a time when MOST people use their mobile phones for everything, this app snatches away all the functionality of the desktop version. There's no easy way to duplicate a tab or close "all" or "other" tabs just by pressing on the tabs themselves. There is no way to save favorites on the homepage. No quick way to get to bookmarks. And worst of all, no option to have all sites open in desktop by default. Horrible user experience. Disaster!

My chrome has also not been working since the last update, won't open or load any page. Have already uninstalled, reinstalled, cleared data, and followed all the troubleshooting instructions in the support pages. These are not a solution! Please help. I have already checked I'm connected to the internet and have already checked out your community answers, they do not solve the problem. Please don't reply with an unhelpful automated response!

title: Skype - free IM & video calls
description:
Skype keeps the world talking. Say ‚Äúhello‚Äù with an instant message, voice or video call ‚Äì all for free*.

Use Skype to send SMS messages to mobiles worldwide and with SMS Connect you can now also read and reply to your phone's SMS messages right from your computer. SMS connect will be released gradually.

‚Ä¢ Video calls ‚Äì Don‚Äôt just hear the cheers, see them! Get together with 1 or 24 of your friends and family on a HD video call. Watch everyone‚Äôs smiles and cries when you tell them ‚ÄúWe‚Äôre engaged!!!" 
‚Ä¢ Chat ‚Äì Reach people instantly. Send messages to your friends, grab someone‚Äôs attention with @ mentions, or create a group chat to plan a family reunion. 
‚Ä¢ SMS Connect - Read and reply to your phone's SMS messages in Skype on your PC or Mac.
‚Ä¢ Share ‚Äì Send photos and videos with your family and friends. Save shared photos and videos to your camera roll. Share your screen to make travel plans with friends or present designs to your team.
‚Ä¢ Voice calls ‚Äì Camera shy? Make voice calls to anyone in the world on Skype. You can also call mobile and landlines at low rates.
‚Ä¢ Express yourself ‚Äì Liven up conversations with emoticons, click on the ‚Äú+‚Äù in chat to send a Giphy or images from the web, and annotate images with words, lines and more.

By downloading the Skype Preview, you‚Äôll gain early access to our newest and coolest features. Of course, while you‚Äôre having fun, know that this app is a work in progress. We're hoping to get your vital feedback as we add new enhancements and features to Skype. Simply click the heart icon on the main screen and you will be able to send your comments to our team, helping us shape the future of Skype.

Skype is available on phones, tablets, PCs and Macs.

*Skype to Skype calls are free. Operator data charges may apply. We recommend using an unlimited data plan or WiFi connection.

comments: I accidentally created an account with my phone number, thinking I was adding it to my already-existing account. Unfortunately, that now means (according to Microsoft customer service) that my phone number can never be associated with my account, even if the accidentally-created account is deleted. One little mistake on my end that any other business would be able to fix now means that this app is less than useless for me. :/

This is a very bad application, I installed this application 5 month ago, they asked for a credit card information. I used if a few days and the App says the first month is free. After that few days I didn't use it anymore but they have charged me for 4 month. They didn't send any in-app notifications for charging or emails, despite the fact that they have already the email. On the other side , the settings is a complicated one and you can't find where to go for cancellation.

This is a great app, since I started using Android phone, I have used Skype since then and the best thing about it is video and audio are very clean, which gives good quality, I like it. By using its app and I will always be in touch with it and I hope that things will come up on the sky better and the process will work and on the sky is the very good app,

Terrible - This app does not work on my android tv box. Skype has downloaded but will not allow me to reach the sign in page. A pop up error message suggests checking my internet connection but there is nothing wrong with my WIFI or Ethernet connections. I guess I'm going to be even more socially distant from my family than planned.

They eat up the money you load after a while. They send you email saying if you do not log in, you will loose your credit. If you miss to log in, it totally disappear. There is no way of talking to someone or getting an email address to send message. You are going looptiloop for hours on their site and find no way to contact them.

title: ANT Radio Service
description:
ANT is a wireless protocol, similar to Bluetooth¬Æ, that is predominantly used for sport and fitness wireless connectivity. Pre-installed by the phone manufacturer, this service allows you to connect ANT+ devices to apps on your phone.  ANT Wireless is a division of Garmin Canada Inc.

ANT enabled apps can utilize this service to connect:
‚Ä¢ Heart Rate: Receive live heart rate data from heart rate straps or wearables produced by many popular manufacturers
‚Ä¢ Fitness Equipment: Connect ANT+ enabled fitness equipment and bicycle trainers to  popular training and workout apps
‚Ä¢ Bike Speed and Cadence: Capture bike speed, distance, and/or cadence data
‚Ä¢ Bike Power: Capture data from ANT+ cycling power meters such as Garmin Vector  
‚Ä¢ Stride-based Speed and Distance Monitor: Capture speed and distance data from running footpods

For a full list of compatible ANT+ apps and devices visit https://www.thisisant.com/directory/

FAQ:
How did this app get on my phone and is it spyware? 
This service is standard software, included by the manufacturer of your phone. It is not illegally downloaded, and it is not spyware. It will not cause system malfunctions or pop-up ads to appear. It is not bloatware and typically uses a max of 20 MB of space. For example, on a 16GB phone, this service takes up 0.0013% of space. We do not pay phone manufacturers to have this service pre-installed. 

How can I remove this service? 
Since this service is standard software, you‚Äôre unable to delete it from your phone. Instead, you can disable this service by following the manufacturer‚Äôs instructions. The typical process is: settings>applications>application manager>appropriate app>force stop>disable

Disabling this service will not affect your phone‚Äôs software. If, in the future, you require the ability to connect to services and devices via ANT+, just enable the service again. 

NOTE: Since this is a factory installed service, it may enable/re-download if you reset and/or update your phone. Don‚Äôt panic! Just follow the instructions to disable it again. 

Does this service track me without my knowledge?
No. The ANT Radio Service and ANT+ Plugins Service applications provide a wireless connectivity service, similar to Bluetooth or WiFi, but with very low power. These services do not collect any personal data.

Is it difficult to develop an app with ANT+ capabilities and is there a fee? 
Using the ANT+ plugins in your app to communicate with ANT+ devices is quick, easy, free and uses a simple API. Visit the ANT Android Developer page (http://www.thisisant.com/developer/ant/ant-in-android) for more information and to download the SDK. 

How do I know if I own any ANT enabled products? 
Visit https://www.thisisant.com/directory to search for ANT/ANT+ enabled products, devices and/or services.

comments: A critical app for active people (runners, cyclists, triathletes, skiers). ANT Radio Service allows things like heart rate monitors, fitness equipment, garmin watches, etc, to connect to your phone & apps using the ANT+ protocol (much more effective than bluetooth and allows multiple connections). It is NOT some secret gov't conspiracy. Man some of you are real pieces of work. Unfortunately with Android Pie, built-in ANT+ seems to have been forgotten, which is a bummer.

How did this app get on my phone and is it spyware? .... Bloatware.... Check permissions.... Yes this is an app that is preinstalled because this company paid Samsung or Google. The permissions to access sensitive information is present. It's funny when the developer has to say the app isn't spyware or bloatware because most of the time that is not true. Open source the code of the app so we, as the users, can see if your claims are true.

STOP TRIPPING!! Its not a radio its FM frequency to connect Smart Watches and Fit Bit type devices so it can communicate with your phone. I bought a Fitbit at Christmas and all of a sudden I see this app on my phone. It didn't come pre-installed on my Samsung S8. It on newer versions now to help make the connection easier for Smart Watches. It helps wrist devices and the app on your phone communicate. It's NOT Spyware, Bloatware or adware.

I understand what people are explaining about the app being preinstalled, and it is supposed to be helping the phone. However, I get paranoid easily especially since I opened a photo stating that people should be aware of a particular URL link because it deals with sex trafficking and THIS APP RANDOMLY STARTED DOWNLOADING... ü§¶üèº‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è if this is really the case then I apologize for my judgement without looking at ALL the reviews and I really do hope it's just a preinstalled app. Thank you.

Let's face some facts. If this app's purpose had been to be helpful to users as opposed to privacy data gathering for others (I'm looking at you, Verizon, Samsung, and developer, et al), we'd be able to delete it if we wanted. Should it be any surprise that the developer assures us that it's entirely harmless? Sheesh!

It has nothing to do with our carriers!!! But it all has to do with Google!!! I've complained to Google about this situation and there is no acception reason explained especially after explaining the control over us how, when and where we use our phone!!! The key words!!! It's designed to study us how, when and where
After reading a bunch of comments below, I began to wonder if this app is why I have to restart my phone every day...at least once... sometimes 2 or 3 times just to get it to operate properly.
This is, by far, the most useful app I've ever used. The colors pop, the sounds are crystal-clear and the font is like looking at an angel.

title: Verizon Call Filter
description:
Your phone is your door to the world, and you shouldn't open it for just anyone. With Call Filter, you can screen incoming calls, auto-block spam and report any unwanted numbers. Or, upgrade to Call Filter Plus with Caller ID for added security. Put a name to the unknown numbers, make your own personal block list, and even assess the risk level of incoming calls. Enroll today and start answering with confidence.

 

Key Features:

‚Ä¢ Get real-time alerts on your incoming call screen so you can better avoid spam calls

‚Ä¢ Automatically send spam callers to voicemail with the spam filter

‚Ä¢ Report a number as spam so you can help improve our algorithm

‚Ä¢ See each spam call‚Äôs level of risk so that you can learn more about the caller

‚Ä¢ Manage other unwanted calls with a personal spam and block list

‚Ä¢ Block all incoming calls from international numbers

‚Ä¢ Search our spam database to see if a number has already been identified as spam

‚Ä¢ Identify unknown numbers by name on the incoming call screen, call log and eligible messaging apps, even if the caller is not saved to your contacts

‚Ä¢ Seamlessly update your contacts with newly identified numbers

 

Eligible customers get a 10-day trial of Call Filter Plus. Customers can choose to enroll in Call Filter to get just the basics (spam detection, blocking and reporting) for free, or subscribe to Call Filter Plus for all that and more for $2.99 per month, per line. Accounts with 3 or more eligible lines can subscribe to Call Filter Plus (Multi-line) for $7.99/mo by logging in to My Verizon. If you choose to enroll in Call Filter or Call Filter Plus via the app, the spam filter will be automatically set to block high-risk spam callers, but you can change your block settings at any time. Data charges apply.

 

Please reference https://www.vzw.com/support/how-to-use-call-filter/ and https://www.vzw.com/support/call-filter-faqs/ for step-by-step instructions on how to use the app and answers to frequently asked questions. For additional details on Call Filter and Call Filter Plus, please see https://www.verizonwireless.com/solutions-and-services/call-filter/.

comments: Does nothing different than the free ones. Dont waste your money. I still get 15-20 calls a day. Not sent to voice. When you are able to stop spoof calls, let me know. This isnt worth a buck and should be free like others. Update, tried it again they claimed its improved, still stinks. Get robocall, much better. Dont waste money here

New updates = nothing new. Please make option to send ALL non-contacts to voicemail. And maybe something that will integrate with Verizon messages to block / send non-contact texts to a different place like a "unknown contacts" group box. Then you can call it Verizon Communications Filter... All risk levels blocked = 25% of actual calls blocked, but it will tell me that it's spam. Gee, I didn't know that already when I haven't lived in my phone's area code for a decade...

If you turn on the more restrictive settings, which is what I want, it can sometimes block numbers that are not spam. Should not be a big deal, you can white list the number. But no, Verizon wants to gouge you for $3 a month to be able to do that. There's one thing you count on with Verizon it's that it will always put profit above the customer.

It's a piece of junk and won't even open on a OnePlus 6T (can't speak to any other device). When I launch the app on my completely up-to-date Android 10 phone, the spinner just spins forever on the app's Verizon branded splash screen. I've left it for an hour and no change. Uninstalled and reinstalled a newer version months later and same behavior. Wishing I hadn't granted it permission to all my contacts now! UNINSTALLED.

Doesnt work with Android 10. Worked before that. Slow to update, so I cancelled that paid service. Not paying for something that doesn't work. I liked how it worked when it was actually working. Won't be resubscribing until it's fixed. Don't waste your time.

title: Skype Lite - Free Video Call & Chat
description:
Skype Lite is the new Skype built for India to meet your daily messaging and video communication needs. It is small, fast, and capable. It lets you send free text messages and make voice & video calls even under limited network conditions. Skype Lite will always help you stay connected with your friends and family. 

What can I do with Skype Lite? 
Skype Lite is designed for the India market with new and integrated features, such as support for SMS, native phone contacts and calls, data usage tracking, India focused Skype Bots to help our users be more productive, in addition to many FREE Skype features like free messaging, audio and video calls, you already know and love! 

Skype Lite is lightweight, quick to download and runs fast on most popular Android devices. It is built with the latest Skype technology to perform well - even under limited network connections and help you save money with data saving features for video call.  Things you can do with Skype Lite now:

‚Ä¢ Free voice or video calls with anyone on Skype 
‚Ä¢ Free voice or video group calling
‚Ä¢ Chat with your friends and family via Skype for free 
‚Ä¢ Never miss important information or date with SMS Insights  
‚Ä¢ Reduced data consumption for Skype video calls
‚Ä¢ Know your data usage in the app any time for messaging and video usage. 
‚Ä¢ Share photos, emoticons, phone screen and files (up to 300 MB)
‚Ä¢ Explore the world of Skype Bots 
‚Ä¢ Free calling from India to US/Canada landlines and mobiles. Excludes special, premium service & non-geographic numbers. Internet and/or mobile fees may apply. See full  terms. 

We are continuously working to improve and enrich your messaging & video calling experience with Skype Lite. Please give us feedback at skypem2feedback@microsoft.com to help shape the future of Skype!

 Skype Group Calling 

Skype is all about bringing people together, so whether it‚Äôs face-to-face over a group video call. Available to all Skype Lite users across India, Group Video Calling allows anyone to join the group video or audio call on Skype Lite ‚Äì all for free. Connecting is easy. Simply tap on the call tab on Skype Lite, and start the group call with your friends on Skype Lite. You can also share a Skype Lite group call link with your friends on popular social apps like WhatsApp, Facebook Messenger or SMS, and invite them to join the call. 
 
Don‚Äôt have a Skype account? Forgot your password? Not a problem! Anyone who receives the group video call link from you can join the call as a guest on Skype Lite right away by providing a name, without the need to sign up or sign into a Skype account any more  .

What is SMS Insights?

SMS Insights is designed to intelligently pull relevant information from your SMS messages and present it at a glance in smart categories such as financial, appointments or travel. Behind the scenes, Microsoft uses machine learning models to classify and extract relevant information from SMS on your phones. These models are run locally on your phones and completely automated. 

What are the key user benefits of SMS Insights?

Using your most recent SMS messages, SMS Insights enables you to:
‚Ä¢	Keep track of appointments
‚Ä¢	Check your bank and wallet balance
‚Ä¢	Track the delivery status of online purchases across providers
‚Ä¢	Review and pay bills
‚Ä¢	Check flight status and check-in for your flight 
‚Ä¢	Check train and PNR status
‚Ä¢	Organize discounts that retailers have sent you via SMS

title: Google Duo - High Quality Video Calls
description:
Google Duo is the highest quality video calling app*. It‚Äôs simple, reliable, and works on smartphones, tablets, Google Nest, and on the web.



    Features:

    Group Calling
 Bring together all the people who matter most, even when you're apart, with group calling. Duo now supports up to 8 people in a group video call.

    Make Calls Between Android and iOS

comments: The video quality and cross platform support is great. With that said there are a few really annoying issues holding this back from a higher score as of the time writing this. 1) You can't seem to add/invite people to an ongoing call. You have to exit the call, create a new group with all people, and the call that group. Really?!? 2) If you have a group call going and it dwindles down to two people it cuts the screen in half for each user instead of full screen with the person you are talking with and small thumbnail for yourself. Fix these two issues and this will be a 5 star app.

I really want to like this app. It have good features, like the low light mode. It works great. But it lacks some fundamental features that it shouldn't. If i made a voice call, i couldn't req for a vid call immediately. I had to end call and call again. If i was in a vid call, i can't change to fon call, and i can't temporarily turn off the camera if i need to. If the other side ends the call, there is no tone to indicates the call was ended. Minor features, but fundamentally important.

I have Duo installed on my android and am attempting to use it on my computer once in a while. When someone calls, it rings on the phone but does not ring on the computer. There is no notification that someone is calling, nor is there any way that alerts me so I can press "answer" and pick up the call. I added duo into my notifications on the web browser as the HELP menu instructed with no luck. What do I do next?

Video seems to stutter & freeze much more than other apps like FB messenger or WhatsApp. This iccurs while communicating with others with good wifi at both ends. This forces us to move off Duo and into another app to communicate.

Latest version not working for outgoing calls on my Galaxy S20. Not sure what was done but tried reinstalling the app. Clearing my cache and even resetting my network settings. Whenever I call anyone it just says immediately "person didn't answer". It only pops up the incoming call on the other end for about 1 second. The only way is to have them call me back to chat. Very annoying for someone who uses duo everyday. Please fix this Google!

Secure, fast, p2p, encrypted, no middleman snooping. Unbeatable.

title: Live Transcribe
description:
Live Transcribe is an accessibility app designed for the Deaf and hard of hearing and usable by anyone. Using Google's state-of-the-art automatic speech recognition technology, Live Transcribe performs real-time transcription of speech and sound to text on your screen, so you can more easily participate in conversations going on in the world around you. You can also keep the conversation going by typing your response on the screen.

On Pixel 3 and up, these additional steps are required to use Live Transcribe:
1. Open your device's Settings app.
2. Tap "Accessibility", then tap "Live Transcribe".
3. Tap "Use service", then accept the permissions.
4. An Accessibility button should now appear at the bottom right corner of your screen, next to the Home button. Tap the Accessibility button or use gesture (https://support.google.com/accessibility/android/answer/7650693) to start Live Transcribe.

Real-time transcription:
‚Ä¢ Supports transcription in over 70 languages and dialects.
‚Ä¢ Supports quick-switching between 2 languages.
‚Ä¢ Displays non-speech sound so that you know if someone is knocking on your door or a dog is barking.
‚Ä¢ Reply without speaking by typing your responses within the app.

Referring back to transcription:
‚Ä¢ You can save a transcript up to 3 days which stays secure on your device. (By default, transcriptions are not saved.)
‚Ä¢ Touch and hold the transcript to copy & paste.

For more accurate transcription:
‚Ä¢ Use an external microphones found in wired headsets, Bluetooth headsets, and USB mics for better audio reception.
‚Ä¢ Check the loudness and noise indicator to find out if your environment is suitable for transcription.

Requirements:
‚Ä¢ Android 5.0 (Lollipop) and up.

Live Transcribe was made in collaboration with Gallaudet University, the premier Deaf and hard of hearing university in the US.

Join the Google Accessible community (https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/accessible) to provide feedback and receive product updates.Visit link: http://g.co/disabilitysupport to connect with an expert on the Disability Support team.

Permissions Notice
Microphone: Live Transcribe needs microphone access to transcribe the speech around you. The audio is not stored after the transcript is processed.

comments: I love this app, it's by far the best there is...and it's still in its infancy stage. This app allows you to dictate and transcribe even under windy conditions. It is extremely accurate when writing out your spoken words, and best of all it allows you to copy and paste your conversation or writings into Google Docs. The developers are spot on, they listen and do what takes to make this the absolute best transcribing app available. I rank it as 4.5 stars. How do I edit my text?

I love this app! I've tried other apps like this one before, but this one is top-of-the-line. I only gave it four stars but that's only because it requires an internet connection. This app was created by Google with that help and input of gallaudet University. It works so well that I'm going to use it all the time! It even transcribes many different languages to such a Spanish. I only have residual hearing a very little of that, and this app is perfect. Way2go Google!

First app of this type which works for me... However, I still have to find out the quickest and fastest way to transfer the text to anozer place. So far, when I'm done with the dictation, I touch the screen with two finger, select all and copy. Then, I have to open either a texting app or Google Doc, paste the text and either text via the texting app or to download the Google Doc. It's faster than typing the whole thing, but it should be simpler. Keep in mind: I need it mostly on chat lines

This app used to work great but now it picks up so much background noise that in a still room , it thinks it hears water running when it's just still air. So frustrating. I used to use this app all the time. I'm dumping it. A bit of advice developer: if it ain't broke, DONT FIX IT!! Stop changing things that dont need to be changed!!!

Painful slow to load after latest update. Used to be instant now few seconds to load. Huge inconvenience when you need it quickly. Often it complained that there is no wifi so it won't work but my LTE is working and fast. Why not use LTE? Want to know if I can use other Google products - bluetooth microphone or nest, etc to follow group conversation?? For example I want to place a microphone on the table in backyard and follow what 3 of my friends are saying on the table.

title: Samsung Push Service
description:
You can check the installation of the app in 'Settings > Application manager' after downloading the Samsung push service.
The Samsung push service provides the notification service only for Samsung services (Samsung Apps, Samsung Link, Samsung Wallet, Samsung Pay, etc.) on Samsung devices.

If you delete the Samsung push service, you may not receive the new notification messages.

The Samsung push service provides the below services.
- New message is displayed in the pop-up window
- Display a badge on the application icon for a new message
- Display new message on the notification bar

Enjoy the fast and precise notification service with the Samsung push service.


* Notice of Permissions
The following permissions are required for the app service. For optional permissions, the default functionality of the service is turned on, but not allowed. 

[Required permissions] 
: Only required in Android L OS and below
- Telephone : Required for device identification when service subscribing 

[Optional permissions]
- Storage : Required for sharing log file to E-mail app when user applying VOC

If your system software version is lower than Android 6.0, please update the software to configure App permissions.
Previously allowed permissions can be reset on Apps menu in device settings after software update.

* Open Source License
Copyright (C) The Android Open Source Project
http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0

This is a wonderful life changing app by samsung. In all my life I suffered due to lack of push to do any thing. I was not pushed to my real abilities. After I bought a Samsung device everything thing changed. This app constantly pushes me to do the things I was afraid of doing earlier. At the time of pooping if I had difficulty to poop I oppen this app and it helps to push my poop extremely hard. Its a shame that this app is available only for Samsung users.

I want to be able to uninstall and delete this app as well as some others especially if I have no use for them. I like to feel like I have control of my devices and it's more time consuming going through each app and denying permissions over and over.

title: Messages
description:
Meet Messages, Google's official app for texting (SMS, MMS) and chat (RCS). Message anyone from anywhere with the reliability of texting and the richness of chat. Stay in touch with friends and family, send group texts, and share your favorite pictures, GIFs, emoji, stickers, videos and audio messages.
Clean, intuitive, and comfortable design
Instant notifications, smart replies and a fresh new design make communicating faster and more fun. With dark mode, you can use Messages comfortably in low-light situations.
Easy sharing
Select or take pictures and videos directly from the app and share easily. You can even send audio messages to your contacts.
Richer conversations
Send audio messages, emoji, stickers, or your location. You can also send and receive payments with Google Pay.
Powerful search
Now you can find more of the content shared in your conversations: tap on the search icon and select a specific contact to see your messaging history with them and all the photos, videos, addresses or links you shared with each other.
Chat features (RCS)
On supported carriers, you can send and receive messages over Wi-Fi or your data network, see when friends are typing or when they have read your message, share images and videos in high quality, and more.
Messages is supported on devices running Android‚Ñ¢ 5.0 Lollipop and above.

comments: I have it and I use it, and I love it. However the only reason it's not my default messages app, is only because my samsung default app has "Quick Response". When I'm driving my taxi, it's nice that I can automatically send a message letting them know im not ignoring them... lol if you guys can get that on your app, I'd be in heaven. Great job tho, guys. It's a great app.

I got this app in order to send/receive texts over wifi. Unfortunately, even after tinkering with it for several hours and reading a lot of troubleshooting articles, I was not able to get this feature to work. Needless to say, I'm disappointed and a bit irritated about the wasted time; I'm now going to uninstall this app and go look for one that actually works.

Great app except it suddenly, without warning assigns default notification settings to every conversation, disregarding the global app settings. When I wipe the data and reconfigure anew it works great for awhile and then bam, all the conversations are back with default notification settings. I can't fix this without going into every conversation and changing the notification settings, one at a time, which is a big job. Thus, I can't use the app.

Only issues I have are this app doesn't light up my screen when I get a text message like the stock one does, and the lack of customization options. I mean really Google? You can't add a few more lines of code to give some options for bubble colors and backgrounds? And I missed a couple texts because I ignored my phone when it dinged because the screen didn't light up till I figured that out. Love the ability to text from my Chromebook though, and it's the only reason I'm keeping it for now.

I really like the functionality of the Google Messages app. However, a MAJOR shortcoming is the inability to automatically purge old messages either by message limit or by age. Since all messages are stored on your phone and not on Google's servers, ultimately the phone's memory use will become excessive - especially given the ability for Messages to send & receive large files and images with RCS. Short of deleting entire ongoing conversations with your contacts - which is rarely desirable - incredibly, there seems to be no other (easy) way to delete old messages except laboriously and manually! The omission of this basic function by Google is unthinkable! It's hard to imagine Google hasn't addressed this. Messaging apps with much less technical expertise and fewer resources than Google include an automatic purge function. Come on, Google, fix this!

title: Jitsi Meet
description:
Jitsi Meet lets you stay in touch with all your teams, be they family, friends, or colleagues. Instant video conferences, efficiently adapting to your scale.

* Unlimited users: There are no artificial restrictions on the number of users or conference participants. Server power and bandwidth are the only limiting factors.
* No account needed.
* Lock-protected rooms: Control the access to your conferences with a password.
* Encrypted by default.
* High quality: Audio and video are delivered with the clarity and richness of Opus and VP8.
* Web browser ready: No downloads are required of your friends to join the conversation. Jitsi Meet works directly within their browsers as well. Simply share your conference URL with others to get started.
* 100% open source: Powered by awesome communities from all over the world. And your friends at Atlassian.
* Invite by pretty URLs: You can meet at the easy to remember https://MySite.com/OurConf of your choice instead of joining the hard to remember rooms with seemingly random sequences of numbers and letters in their names.

title: 3CX Android App - Free Calls via your Extension
description:
Work on the go and always stay connected with the office with the 3CX App for Android. Make and receive office calls directly on your Android device without ever giving away your personal phone number. 
 
Need to be more productive and mobile? Schedule and attend conference calls as well as video calls, use the chat feature to send messages to your colleagues, view the status of your colleagues and much more, all included for FREE. 
 
The app fully supports PUSH, allowing your device to be on standby when not in use and save battery life. When an incoming call occurs on your office extension, your device will 'wake up' and notify you as it would with a regular GSM call. If you don‚Äôt want to take a call you can mute it or set your status to unavailable.
 
Easy to setup and configure via QR code you‚Äôll be up and running in a matter of minutes!
 
Benefits include:
 
- Make and receive calls on your Android device from your office extension.
- One number concept  - Calls made to your office extension will ring on your Android device.
- Reduced mobile phone bill; call colleagues via the 3CX app rather than via the mobile network.
- Seamless out of office or in office detection.
- Transfer & Hold calls.
- Easily change your status (available, busy etc.).
- Receive multiple calls simultaneously.
- View the status of your colleagues.
- Easily setup conference calls.
- Easy setup video conference.
- Instant Corporate Chat.
- 3CX live chat & talk messages from your website appear on your device.
- Switch between 3G/4G and WiFI networks when on the move.
- End-to-end secure calls via encrypted tunnel.
- Hassle free setup and configuration via QR code.
 
More information: http://www.3cx.com/phone-system/android-ios-voip/
 
Important: The 3CX app for Android requires 3CX Phone System v16, Update 3 and above. Do not download or rate if you do not have a current installation of 3CX Phone System.

If you do not want to update your 3CX Server installation, then you need to uninstall this app, and install the legacy 15.5 app from here 
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.tcx.sipphone_legacy

Video

comments: The app is sadly a huge battery drain. Furthermore the UI is poorly made and not intuitive to use. Answering calls sometimes makes them go to Speaker mode. In the Android app it's not explained properly how to log out of a queue, difficult to find. Call quality is very poor due to low volume, echo and drops in calls. Could use more options like on Windows OS. I'm sorry for the poor review, if the app is updated and the issues are fixed I'm more than willing to change it of course.

I'm using this on Galaxy Note 10 plus - all appears OK until I receive a call. Unable to answer using the Galaxy when the screen is locked.I can only cancel the call. If I pick up on the desk handset, the Galaxy then continues to ring. I have also had instances when 3CX on the Galaxy has started to ring for a call that had ended earlier. When making a call - it is hit and miss whether I will be heard after someone picks up - WiFi signal is strong so unclear what is happening here. Same when I answer a call (when lock screen is off), I can hear the caller they can't hear me. I have no issue with the web and desktop apps. Disappointed that I cannot achieve full mobility as a result

Using 3cx on all devices. I find the call quality to be a bit horrible most days, regardless of changing microphone gain would be great to have some function during calls to quickly access the quality of the call. and the details of the reports lacks a bit of body. But it's easy to use anywhere.

They removed the Exit ignore push option. I legitimately have to uninstall this app whenever I don't want to use it. The 3cx team seems to imply using the silent feature is the same as the exit feature. This is a blatant lie. Your phone still rings/vibrates and gets the calls going to it. This is an atrocious app if you ever want to use 3cx on a computer and mobile you effectively have to uninstall the ph app whenever you just want to use the computer.

It's okay, but I'm not really a fan of the way it now works with Android 10. If I've received a call on my office desk phone, the 3CX phone app is up and running in the foreground even after the call is finished despite the fact I never used my mobile phone to answer the call.

title: Puffin TV - Fast Web Browser
description:
Puffin TV is a special edition of Puffin optimized for Android TV users for video watching, music listening and Internet surfing.

A better user experience is made possible by Puffin's wicked fast cloud rendering. Puffin is faster than other browsers or even native apps. The performance advantage is especially noticeable on entry-level Android TV sets.

Puffin TV removes the traditional web browser UI for a fully immersed Android TV experience. Puffin UI is kept as subtle and intuitive as possible. For example, Puffin TV automatically recommends most popular sites for users. It has never been easier to share a page from your smart phone to Puffin TV.

‚òÜ Incredible page load and rendering speed
‚òÜ Optimized video playback
‚òÜ Intuitive app navigation design
‚òÜ Sharing pages to Puffin TV from any devices
‚òÜ Full web experience
‚òÜ Fastest JavaScript engine

===== Limitations =====
* The data centers of Puffin are in the US and the cloud servers can only access public web sites from US geolocations. 
* For users outside the US, local contents, especially videos of local interest, may not be accessible from the US due to geo-restrictions in their home countries.
* Puffin is blocked in some countries (e.g., China, Saudi Arabia, United Arab Emirates) and by some schools (e.g., in United States).

title: VidyoConnect
description:
VidyoConnect‚Ñ¢ is an enterprise meeting solution for team collaboration.  

Stay connected and engaged on-the-go.  With a powerful and intuitive user experience from your Android phone or tablet, VidyoConnect delivers the reliability, ease-of-use and rich features needed for productive face-to-face video meetings.

Key Features:

Join and host multipoint video conferencing meetings from your Android phone or tablet 
Customize conferencing layout with up to 4 on-screen participants for phones, and up to 8 on-screen participants for tablets 
View shared meeting content during a video conference 
Make any participant or content share bigger with pinch-to-zoom and real-time panning 
Optimize quality and efficiency with automatic and adaptive encoding modes
Meet reliably and up to the challenges and unpredictability of wireless, 3G and 4G networks and withstand significant packet loss with no impact on image quality
Automatically reconnect to your call in transient network conditions 
Log in easily and quickly with SAML authentication
Dial out to SIP and H.323 endpoints 

The VidyoConnect app requires a paid VidyoConnect subscription to VidyoCloud or an on-premises deployment of VidyoConferencing‚Ñ¢ in order to enjoy the full capabilities of the app. 

By installing this application, you acknowledge that you have read and understood this description. You acknowledge that this application may require access to your camera and/or contacts in order to function properly. You consent to receive communications, updates, and upgrades from Vidyo for this application or from the operator of any Vidyo system to which this application connects (an "Operator"). The Operator of each Vidyo system to which this application connects may collect meeting usage data and personal information, such as your screen name, email address and IP address, from the application when it connects to such system, which will be subject to any terms of services, privacy policy and/or similar provisions of such Operator. You can withdraw your consent at any time by uninstalling this application. If you need assistance with removing this application, please contact support@vidyo.com.

IF YOU ARE UNSURE ABOUT YOUR COMPANY‚ÄôS SUBSCRIPTION TO VidyoConnect OR DEPLOYMENT OF VidyoConferencing, PLEASE CONTACT YOUR IT DEPARTMENT.

title: VidyoMobile
description:
VidyoMobile requires a Vidyo account through your enterprise or third party Vidyo service provider.
	
	This version of VidyoMobile delivers up to full HD business grade point-to-point and multipoint video conferencing to your Android smartphone or tablet device when connected to your enterprise or service provider‚Äôs Vidyo infrastructure. 
	
	Experience telepresence quality conferencing with shared content viewing on the move with VidyoMobile. The same low latency, reliable high quality video experience that is delivered to high-end room systems and desktops is extended to your Android devices. Your mobile device can connect seamlessly with VidyoDesktops, VidyoRooms, VidyoPanorama and legacy H.323 and SIP based endpoints through the VidyoGateway. 
	
	Unreliable wireless networks have traditionally posed challenges for video conferencing. Vidyo‚Äôs patented Adaptive Video Layering technology is the difference between VidyoMobile‚Äôs reliable video interaction at the pace of conversation, and the broken pictures and unnatural delays of traditional video conferencing solutions. Through this technology, video streams are dynamically optimized to provide the best quality video based on both the capabilities of the mobile device and the performance of the wireless network. 
	
	The VidyoMobile app is simple to install and use. VidyoMobile users have control over their layout and can choose which participants they want to view and can dynamically change between portrait and landscape orientations as well as preferred speaker and continuous presence modes. Since multiple desktop participants can share data in the conference at the same time, VidyoMobile offers a content dock where shared data may be previewed and selected or returned to the dock and hidden off screen, all with common Android gesture controls.

By installing this application, you acknowledge that you have read and understood this description. You acknowledge that this application may require access to your camera and/or contacts in order to function properly. You can withdraw your consent at any time by uninstalling this application. If you need assistance with removing this application, please contact support@vidyo.com.
descriptionHTML:
VidyoMobile requires a Vidyo account through your enterprise or third party Vidyo service provider.

This version of VidyoMobile delivers up to full HD business grade point-to-point and multipoint video conferencing to your Android smartphone or tablet device when connected to your enterprise or service provider‚Äôs Vidyo infrastructure.

Experience telepresence quality conferencing with shared content viewing on the move with VidyoMobile. The same low latency, reliable high quality video experience that is delivered to high-end room systems and desktops is extended to your Android devices. Your mobile device can connect seamlessly with VidyoDesktops, VidyoRooms, VidyoPanorama and legacy H.323 and SIP based endpoints through the VidyoGateway.

Unreliable wireless networks have traditionally posed challenges for video conferencing. Vidyo‚Äôs patented Adaptive Video Layering technology is the difference between VidyoMobile‚Äôs reliable video interaction at the pace of conversation, and the broken pictures and unnatural delays of traditional video conferencing solutions. Through this technology, video streams are dynamically optimized to provide the best quality video based on both the capabilities of the mobile device and the performance of the wireless network.

The VidyoMobile app is simple to install and use. VidyoMobile users have control over their layout and can choose which participants they want to view and can dynamically change between portrait and landscape orientations as well as preferred speaker and continuous presence modes. Since multiple desktop participants can share data in the conference at the same time, VidyoMobile offers a content dock where shared data may be previewed and selected or returned to the dock and hidden off screen, all with common Android gesture controls.

By installing this application, you acknowledge that you have read and understood this description. You acknowledge that this application may require access to your camera and/or contacts in order to function properly. You consent to receive communications, updates, and upgrades from Vidyo for this application or from the operator of any Vidyo system to which this application connects (an "Operator"). The Operator of each Vidyo system to which this application connects may collect meeting usage data and personal information, such as your screen name, email address and IP address, from the application when it connects to such system, which will be subject to any terms of services, privacy policy and/or similar provisions of such Operator. You can withdraw your consent at any time by uninstalling this application. If you need assistance with removing this application, please contact support@vidyo.com.
summary: Simple, high quality video, audio and content conferencing and collaboration
recentChanges: Application updated for 32bit/64bit support
comments: Have to install the phone app because Linux isn't supported any more and seg faults. The phone app asks me to accept the conditions. I click accept and nothing happens. Tried several times with varying degrees of firmness from light tapping to pressure that would turn hydrogen metallic. Threatening my phone with corporal punishment, invoking the spirit of Terry Pratchett, and unplugging the dishwasher didn't help. I'll just shout really loud for my meeting tomorrow, then have some cheesecake.

Constant crashes. Unreliable. Almost completely unable to use. Have re-installed many times but crashes continue. Negatively impacting my job. Very dissatisfied struggling with this dumb app at 4:45am

Works, but I but so frustrating. - there doesn't seem to be a way to turn off the video image if it isn't being transmitted - there are times I just want to listen and put the phone in my pocket. But this app hangs up if the phone is turned off. - lots of hang ups and app crashes when moving in and out of wifi range.

I don't even know where to start... oh wait, one of the main problems with conferencing software is people not muting themselves. Well guess what. The mute button on this app mutes *them*. You can't mute just to listen in. But then, that is assuming you can stay connected. I gave up and uninstalled after the 3rd disconnect in 15 minutes.

I'm trying to connect using Grandstream GCV3200 teleconference, however it always shows "Vidyo communication error". I've tried connecting to other android devices, and they've connected successfully. I'm not sure yet if this app needs to be fixed, or I have to contact the device supplier for this.

title: mDiakonnect
description:
mDiakonnect is designed to keep users up to date on the latest news from Diakon Lutheran Social Ministries (senior living) and Diakon Child and Family Community Ministries. This app makes sure you are always aware of the latest news, commentary, special messages, access to important documents and more from Diakon.  Using mDiakonnect, you can always be up to date on happenings at Diakon such as tours of our senior living facilities, adoption events, and much more.

Dating to 1868, Diakon daily transforms the lives of children, youths, families and adults of all ages in Pennsylvania and Maryland through programs ranging from comprehensive senior living communities to community-based services such as adoption, foster care, programs for at-risk youths, family and individual counseling, adult day services, meals on wheels, health-insurance counseling, volunteer opportunities, disaster response and more. Serving between 75,000 and 90,000 people annually, Diakon has an annual additional community benefit of more than $21 million. Diakon‚Äôs mission is to help our neighbors through compassionate service, gracious hospitality and charitable care. Typically, that benevolent care amounts to more than $1 million a month.

comments: I like this app however we recently had to get this app for work purposes on our personal cell and it uploaded my personal contact. I thought it was going to upload only my work contacts, not happy with that and would like to.get that reverse. How to clear the number of missed calls. I tried clearing them but it's still showing number of missed calls. Other than that I love using it at work. Maybe I'll like using it at home for work too.

I recently got an update to the app, I use an android. I am having an issue where the app will crash every time I try and join my meeting. I have my office calendar synced and everything. I try and join, the app closes out in error. Have not been able to find a solution and it is super frustrating.

Popped up with an incoming call notification for a fraction of a second then instantly said missed call. There was no way to answer. I discovered the Hiya call blocker that came installed on my Note 10+ was set to block private numbers. It must count 8x8 calls as private because I unblocked private numbers in the call blocker app and now 8x8 runs great. Very convenient for doing business away from home.

Performance is generally good but with the recent update my contact list is suddenly filled with all my Google contacts. Virtual Office is for my office contacts only and I can't find settings to turn that off. I turned it off on the app controls of my phone but Virtual Office does not pay attention to that apparently. Update: Things got back on track and are working well. We'll see how it goes as I have ordered a new phone.

UI is pretty good but frequently have issues with call quality. The standard VoIP phone are nice and clear, but the cell app quality is not ideal. I'm often forced to have people call me back on my standard cell number, which of course works fine.

title: Auto Redial
description:
A simple program (dialer) to automatically make calls (auto dial) to a specified number.

The program is designed for automatic dialing to city, long-distance, international numbers, as well as SIP and IP .

The application supports 2 (two) SIM cards (dual sim).

The application has support for scheduled calls. You can specify a schedule for automatic redial with different options.

The program has the following types of schedule:
- once at a specified time and date;
- recurring daily or on certain days of the week at a specified time;
- recurring calls after a specified period of time.

In the application settings, you can enable or disable the speakerphone during a call. (By default, it is enabled).
Also in the settings you can turn on the alert with a sound alert before the start of the call on a schedule.

All required permissions are needed for work the application. The data will not be sent, not collected and are not processed, and used for making calls.

The application has support for scheduled calls. You can specify a schedule for automatic redial with different options.

The program has the following types of schedule:
- once at a specified time and date;
- recurring daily or on certain days of the week at a specified time;
- recurring calls after a specified period of time.

In the application settings, you can enable or disable the speakerphone during a call. (By default, it is enabled).
Also in the settings you can turn on the alert with a sound alert before the start of the call on a schedule.

All required permissions are needed for work the application. The data will not be sent, not collected and are not processed, and used for making calls.
summary: Automatic dialing (redial) with schedule support and 2 SIM cards. Auto Dialer.
comments: 4 stars because needs an update and fix. After my phone updates to oxygen os 10 the app timer is not function anymore, it just disappear. I used this app more than a year now and i can say its the best app i ever found in this term, its free and its hassle feee too. Its worth to download and its very simple to use. Please fix it because i find it very usefull for me. Thanks for this awesome app

Really amazing.. I used it to make continuous call to my girlfriend because she was angry and you know calling over and over is a sign of love. But it's too much annoying to me lol. With this app I could able to call her again and again .. just set number, how much times call to need and it has started to do it's work ... Also this app has an amazing system. It can make calls on loud speaker. So that you can do other work until she take the call. Love this app üòò

It does what it's supposed to. Would of gave it 5 stars but I don't like that you can't go to your home screen or do anything else while using it, because it will stop calling. But when you go back to the app, it picks up where you left off.

There should be an option that the speaker turns on when the call is attended. Another option that when the call is attended it should mute the call. When we set call duration it appears on the screen and then u can't open and work on other apps. Please fix all these three issues.
Very good app, just what i looking for, it do its job, that's it. Working perfect on android 7.0.0 but not working on android 9 stock, the call duration and the hang up settings are missing...

title: Mitel Connect (Formerly ShoreTel)
description:
Bring your desk phone with you wherever you go with the Mitel Connect mobile app. Easily access your enterprise contacts, join conferences with one click, and manage your calls and voicemails - all powered by our new user-friendly design.

Key benefits of Mitel Connect for Android: 
- New dashboard to manage your work day
- Contact your colleagues without using carrier minutes
- View upcoming events and join meetings in one click
- No more giving out your personal number - your Mitel Connect business caller ID is used when placing calls 
- Reach coworkers quickly via favorites or extensions
- Visually manage your voicemails 
- Manage your missed calls and view recent activities from your dashboard
- Handover between WiFi and cellular and never lose a call 
- And more!

For more information go to:
https://oneview.mitel.com/s/article/Mitel-Connect-for-Android
 
Note: This app is for Mitel Connect, Mitel 14.2 and ShoreTel Sky customers only.


Warning: VoIP over 3G/4G/LTE networks
Mitel is not liable for any charges, fees or liability imposed by your mobile carrier for the use of this service. Voice quality is subject to Wi-Fi or 3G/4G/LTE signal quality and available bandwidth.

IMPORTANT
‚Ä¢ This application requires connectivity to a Mitel Connect Mobility Router and will not operate without this component. Please contact your business ‚ÄòIT department if you are unsure if your company has deployed the Mitel Connect Mobility solution. 
‚Ä¢ This application is intended only for enterprise calling. As such, emergency calls (e.g. 911) will be routed over the cellular radio when available and not over WiFi.
‚Ä¢By downloading and using this application you hereby agree to the terms in the accompanying End User License Agreement (EULA).

*MiCloud Users (US Only):

A whole new login experience and we have unified the login experience with other Mitel Apps.

comments: Newest version (Jan 27, 2020) is completely unusable. Runs for an hour or two, permacrashes. Have to uninstall and reinstall to get a couple more hours out of it. Can't downgrade to a working version because Mitel's servers no longer accept the older clients.
Battery consumption very high. My phone quite heaty when the apps background running

The app works OK on android now, with a couple of caveats. If you pick up a call ringing on your mobile and phone using the mobile, the desk phone registers a missed call. If you receive a call on your mobile without your mobile number configured in the portal (which doesn't accept some numbers!) you have to manually accept the call.
I have constant issues with opening this app.

Much improved app that allows someone like me who doesn't get to o many calls on my work extension to keep one phone that I can use for both personal and business. It's nice not to be able to use the same bluetooth accessories with my one phone regardless of who is calling.

title: WhatsApp Messenger
description:
WhatsApp from Facebook

WhatsApp Messenger is a FREE messaging app available for Android and other smartphones. WhatsApp uses your phone's Internet connection (4G/3G/2G/EDGE or Wi-Fi, as available) to let you message and call friends and family. Switch from SMS to WhatsApp to send and receive messages, calls, photos, videos, documents, and Voice Messages.

WHY USE WHATSAPP:

‚Ä¢ NO FEES: WhatsApp uses your phone's Internet connection (4G/3G/2G/EDGE or Wi-Fi, as available) to let you message and call friends and family, so you don't have to pay for every message or call.* There are no subscription fees to use WhatsApp.

‚Ä¢ MULTIMEDIA: Send and receive photos, videos, documents, and Voice Messages.

‚Ä¢ FREE CALLS: Call your friends and family for free with WhatsApp Calling, even if they're in another country.* WhatsApp calls use your phone's Internet connection rather than your cellular plan's voice minutes. (Note: Data charges may apply. Contact your provider for details. Also, you can't access 911 and other emergency service numbers through WhatsApp).

‚Ä¢ GROUP CHAT: Enjoy group chats with your contacts so you can easily stay in touch with your friends or family.

‚Ä¢ WHATSAPP WEB: You can also send and receive WhatsApp messages right from your computer's browser.

‚Ä¢ NO INTERNATIONAL CHARGES: There's no extra charge to send WhatsApp messages internationally. Chat with your friends around the world and avoid international SMS charges.*

‚Ä¢ SAY NO TO USERNAMES AND PINS: Why bother having to remember yet another username or PIN? WhatsApp works with your phone number, just like SMS, and integrates seamlessly with your phone's existing address book.

‚Ä¢ ALWAYS LOGGED IN: With WhatsApp, you're always logged in so you don't miss messages. No more confusion about whether you're logged in or logged out.

‚Ä¢ QUICKLY CONNECT WITH YOUR CONTACTS: Your address book is used to quickly and easily connect you with your contacts who have WhatsApp so there's no need to add hard-to-remember usernames.

‚Ä¢ OFFLINE MESSAGES: Even if you miss your notifications or turn off your phone, WhatsApp will save your recent messages until the next time you use the app.

‚Ä¢ AND MUCH MORE: Share your location, exchange contacts, set custom wallpapers and notification sounds, broadcast messages to multiple contacts at once, and more!

*Data charges may apply. Contact your provider for details.

--------------------------------------------------------- 
We're always excited to hear from you! If you have any feedback, questions, or concerns, please email us at:

android-support@whatsapp.com

or follow us on twitter:

http://twitter.com/WhatsApp
@WhatsApp
---------------------------------------------------------
