recentChanges: - Dark mode is now available. Try it by going to Settings > Chats > Theme > select ‚ÄòDark‚Äô. For users on Android 10, dark mode is enabled automatically when you turn it on in system settings.
comments: Very useful app. But still there is a security issue. Because, anyone who is an admin of any group, can add any number without their permission. Instead I have a suggestion that, if a group admin needs to add a number to that group, then the owner of that number should receive a message to opt "YES I am interested to join" or " NO I am not interested to join". This will ensure more individual security. Hope you will update the changes. Thank you.

Not the best instant messaging app but the most popular, which pretty much forces one to use it, and it's decent, especially now that it has a dark mode, save for the fact that we still can't edit messages to fix mistakes, or that we can't select messages and press the text bar to quote them like before, not even as an option. Two things to be added that'd greatly improve the app.

Since the 20/03/2020 update I can no longer open whatsapp. It crashes every time. I can only access it if someone sends me a message and I click on the notification. I have been using this app for years and this is the first major problem I have encountered. I have cleared cache and even reinstalled a number of times without any success. I'm using a huawei P30. Please fix this issue/bug, i use this app every day to keep in contact with friends and family. I have notified support but no help

Before the start of 2020 WhatsApp was the best social App ever created. However, since the start of the year, I'm not sure what changed but it went from a 10 star to a 1 star. Video calls are poor and voice calls are worse. You talk for a few minutes then the person on the other cannot hear you. At 1st I thought it was temporary but this has being going on steady for months.

This app is very useful for me. It keeps my work sorted and I can also stay connected with my loved ones easily. It also helps in my business. A lots of pictures I can share with my clients easily. Easy conversation. Calls quality is good Video call feature is also nice. Overall this is very useful application for anyone and easy to use....

title: Comcast Business
description:
AVAILABLE TO COMCAST BUSINESS CUSTOMERS

Access your Comcast Business account anytime and anywhere with the Comcast Business App‚Äîan innovative, all-in-one tool designed with your business in mind. With streamlined navigation and an intuitive layout, the Comcast Business App makes it easier than ever to manage your account on the go, right from your mobile device. 

With the Comcast Business App, you can*:

‚Ä¢	Manage your account details
‚Ä¢	View upcoming service appointments
‚Ä¢	Pay your bill, view past invoices, and manage your payment methods
‚Ä¢	Enroll in Auto Pay and Paperless Billing
‚Ä¢	Manage WiFi networks, hotspots, and more
‚Ä¢	Set up notifications for billing and service requests
‚Ä¢	Stay up-to-date on your service status
‚Ä¢	View your TV channel lineup
‚Ä¢	Forward calls to your home, mobile phone, or colleagues with Call Forwarding 
‚Ä¢	Troubleshoot technical issues in a few easy steps
‚Ä¢	Access Comcast Business Support

Comcast Business Voice Mobility, Business VoiceEdge¬Æ, and Business VoiceEdge Select‚Ñ¢ customers can also**:

‚Ä¢	Easily host a conference call for up to 50 participants (Business VoiceEdge¬Æ customers only)
‚Ä¢	View recent calls, listen to and manage voicemail, and customize greetings 
‚Ä¢	Make outgoing calls through the app to display your business phone number on caller IDs
‚Ä¢	Quickly transfer calls to colleagues or third parties
‚Ä¢	Forward calls to your home, mobile phone, or colleagues with Call Forwarding 
‚Ä¢	Quickly move active calls to your Be Anywhere devices and desk phones
‚Ä¢	Select the phones that will ring on inbound calls by managing Be Anywhere devices
‚Ä¢	Easily manage security settings

*Features are available to Business Internet, Business TV, Business Voice, Business Voice Mobility, and/or Business VoiceEdge Select‚Ñ¢ customers. Features will vary depending on your services.

**Features are available to Business Voice Mobility, Business VoiceEdge Select‚Ñ¢, and/or Business VoiceEdge¬Æ customers. Features will vary depending on your services.

recentChanges:
For Comcast Business Internet Customers:

You can now restart your modem directly from the app! If you‚Äôre experiencing connection issues with your Internet service, select Restart Modem from the Internet section of your Overview screen to go through the restart process. Please note, only customers with one modem will have access to this feature.
comments: I haven't been able to log in for weeks. Just a blank screen. Restart and same scenario.
I try logging in and just get a pop up "Something went wrong." I'm on a Galaxy S8 and this is unacceptable for my business.

Hate this app, but need it for work. I've had to uninstall and reinstall at least once a week to get it to work. Slow and clunky. Gave it 2 stars because when it works well, it's great. Too bad it's not consistent. Co workers have the same complaints.

TERRIBLE app - worse than Comcast's email app, which I didn't think was possible. Will not open on my Galaxy S8+. Have uninstalled and reinstalled several times without success. I work remotely, so as of now I an unable to access my company's phone system. Totally unacceptable.
Doesn't work properly. Be Anywhere screen is gone. Thinking about switch to another company.

comments: Very nice people to communicate with, but I'm having a problems with the application itself, there doesn't seem to be a place in the application to pay for a cellphone top up with the credit in my account. They continue to tell me the steps and what to do...but for some reason I cannot see where after purchasing a credit ...where I can pay for a top up by that credit .
Excellent. Easy and fast
Pretty good app, it works for me. So far so good.
Good service, very satisfied
Good price and service

title: GoToConnect
description:
GoToConnect Mobile is a simple & secure fully integrated VoIP, meetings and messaging business solution. With GoToConnect Mobile, you and your employees can use personal devices for video & audio communications. You can now virtually meet, talk and text from a business number‚Äîwithout surrendering your private phone number.
You can also easily track metrics to gain insights into usage for each individual employee. Enjoy HD audio quality, battery-life optimization, and reliable mobile productivity anywhere you go.
Here‚Äôs why GoToConnect Mobile is perfect for your business:
Best in class VoIP solution (Powered by Jive):
Make and receive calls whenever you have WiFi or data over the most optimal OPUS G.711 standards, while keeping your personal phone number private.
Do Not Disturb:
Separate your business hours from your personal hours with our Do Not Disturb feature.
Hide Caller ID:
Now you can hide or display your business number when making calls.
Fully Integrated Meetings Solution:
Start and join meetings with your team and clients in very simple steps.
Contact Syncing
Sync your phonebook contacts and integrated email contacts right into your GoToConnect app.
Meeting Calendar Integration:
Booked a meeting in your calendar? We got you covered! You can now see your scheduled calendar meetings that are conducted over GoToConnect right in your mobile app.
Meeting Reminders:
Receive reminders for your booked meetings.

developerAddress:
320 Summer St,
Boston, MA 02210
United States of America
recentChanges:
- [Home Page Updates]: Swipe actions on home page
- [Home Page Updates]: SMS notifications on home page
- New Contact Detail drawer accessible from homepage avatars and conversations.
- Bug fixes
- Usability and performance improvements
comments: This app is seemingly better than the Jive Mobile app that it's replacing but there are 2 key things that I'm hoping will be updated. If so, I'd give 5 stars. 1. The Name on the Caller ID now shows up when a call is coming in since my initial review (so I'm giving 4 instead of 3 stars). 2. You can't listen to voicemails on the ear speaker, only the loud one. VM Forwarding would be nice also. Thank you development team for responding quickly to feedback.

This app is severely lacking, Specifically what it's lacking is a Create Contact from text message or call log screen, Doesn't show contacts address and obviously you cant click on a link of the address to take you to maps locations. Cant copy and paste any text to even make it a bit simpler to open your Iphone contacts to create a contact. Fix all that and I'll have a good review for it. UPDATE, AWESOME..i knew you guys could do it!!! Great Job fixing these issues

Needed for work. App ringing is unreliable. Contacts imported from phone system (sidecar) cannot be edited and do not get updated when updated in the sidecar list. Does not differentiate between personal and business calls. Can't set special ringtones via the app to help distinguish business/personal. This is much worse than the Jive app we started with, which finally was greatly improved and working well just before we were notified that we had to switch to GoToConnect.

Extremely unstable app. If I am connected to wifi when o get a call, I have to disconnect before answering so the call doesn't drop seconds later. Issues answering 8/10 calls as the app rings while on silent or will ring but doesn't pop up or open so you can answer the call. Its unfortunate, I felt that the Jive app (70% reliable) just had its major kinks worked out before switching to GoToConnect. I have to use the app for work (sales) so I dont have a choice but really disappointed.
My issue was due to another third party app on my phone. Once I disabled the other app, GoToConnect works now. Sorry about that.

title: Gas Jockey
description:
Gas Jockey conveniently brings fuel to your car with a scheduled delivery while you are at home, work, or wherever.  Not only do you receive a full tank, but also a complimentary window wash, just as a gas jockey, or attendants, used to do. 

How it works: 
1.	Download Gas Jockey and create your account
2.	Choose a time frame that works for you
3.	Use the drop pin or enter your location
4.	Pop your gas tank lid
5.	Have your tank filled while at work, school, etc.

Operating in the Greater Houston Metropolitan Area, Gas Jockey provides fuel deliver service six days a week, Monday through Saturday, from 7 am to 7 PM.  Gas Jockey is convenient, easy too use, and can fill your tank within just a two hour window!  Fuel costs are competitively priced with the gas stations near you and the fuel is fresh, saving you time and money. Not to mention, Gas Jockey notifies you when your tank is filled leaving you to get on with your day. 

What areas in Houston does Gas Jockey Serve?
Currently, Gas Jockey serves the Pinehurst, Tomball, The Woodlands, New Caney, Porter Humble, Aldine, Spring, Jersey Villege, and Cypress areas. 

Features: 
‚Ä¢	Easy to use drop pin location 
‚Ä¢	Receive in-time push notifications
‚Ä¢	View your order history
‚Ä¢	Schedule your delivery 
‚Ä¢	Update your user profile
‚Ä¢	Accessible customer service
‚Ä¢	User friendly interface

title: Phone Color Screen - Colorful Caller Screen Themes
description:
Do you tired of the boring call color, the call screen themes on your phone?  Get a color call to find stylish call flash & screen themes. Try to make answering the phone a cool thing!
 
This app will make receiving an incoming call or making outgoing calls very feasible for the users with just a touch away. With the help of this app, you can customize the way your phone notifies you upon incoming and outgoing calls, SMS, video calls and missed calls.
 
This Phone Color Screen is an awesome caller screen app for incoming calls with more stylish themes. Customize your phone with beauty caller screen themes. Are you bored with the default or old call screen themes? Or do you want to change more various themes?

title: Lifesize Video Conferencing
description:
Experience video conferencing in the most effortless and effective way possible. 

Lifesize delivers award-winning, cloud-based video conferencing technology that allows you to connect, communicate, and collaborate‚Äîfrom one-on-one audio and video calls to full-scale company meetings spanning multiple locations.

With the Lifesize app, you can stay connected on the go. Start or join a meeting instantly, meet face to face with the highest-quality video and audio, share your screen, chat in real time, sync with your calendar, and more.

Lifesize. Work together.

Features include:
‚Ä¢	Start a call or schedule a meeting instantly
‚Ä¢	Share content from your device with other participants while in a call
‚Ä¢	Comprehensive, name-based directory with search and status
‚Ä¢	Click to call contacts, rooms, and meetings
‚Ä¢	Add connections as favorites for quick and easy communication
‚Ä¢	Support for hands-free calling when paired to compatible audio systems
‚Ä¢	Send meeting invites via email or text message
‚Ä¢	Send and receive messages with real-time, one-on-one and meeting room chat
‚Ä¢	Calendar integration with optional meeting notifications
‚Ä¢	Swipe to hide video and enter listen-only mode
‚Ä¢	Pinch to zoom in on video and presentations 
‚Ä¢	Record calls and meetings for access on demand from cloud video library
‚Ä¢	Control room system camera from your device in supported calling situations
‚Ä¢	Optionally enable dark mode to switch to a darker color scheme

Have a question or need help? Contact us at https://www.lifesize.com/support/contact-support

Note: Available features may vary by Android version. Updating your device to the latest version is recommended for the best experience.

recentChanges:
Thank you for using the Lifesize mobile app! Here's what's new in this release:

- You can now search for a participant from the participant's list while in a call or remotely moderating a meeting
- When you are remotely moderating a meeting, your screen will remain on
- Performance improvements in calls with a large number of participants
- Additional bug fixes
comments: Our company uses this app all of the time and for the most part it has been very dependable for the past 2 years. There have been some minor issues That we have encountered but they were usually after a recent update of the app and life size was quick to fix the problem once we notified them. I'm giving you 5 stars.... So next year when we re-up on our contract think about giving us a discount.... Lol! Jk jk jk
I can easily make and receive calls, set up virtual meetings and even share my screen. Calls even work very well on not so great bandwidth conditions. Great complement to the Lifesize ecosystem.
Very good. But finding difficult how to group many Contacts for a meeting.

Inability to cut off camera and mic before joining a meeting drew some very unwanted attention rejoining in a noisy environment. Ability to stay connected when shifting from WiFi to LTE is very poor leading to the above issue.

Initially, ran into trouble as the purple bar with a # on it was not pressable, and the green checkmark on the keypad did not submit the room code. A call to support (and a bad review here) brought quick response, which is appreciated. After three months of multi-point use: this is a solid high-quality software. Good audio quality, and is given priority. Quick focus switching when someone starts speaking. Facilities for all the usual videoconferencing features. Kudos to developers.

title: Live Mobile Location and GPS Coordinates
description:
Live Mobile Location is a Wonderful app to all the android users to find their Current location. They can easily check their live location with just one Click.

Using this Live Mobile Location every one can easily find their Live Mobile Address on the Map and can also share their locations with just one click.

Where ever  you travel you can easily check your Live Address or the Current Location and can share it with friends.

This app can identify your Current location / Cell Location  and will show it on the MAP only once. This won't store your location.

Using this app you can find your Mobile Address Location. It will show the complete address.

This app required your Mobile GPS to find your Live Location / Current Location and display your Current Address. 

This application can be used as a GPS Address Locator. It means you can find GPS Address.

By using GPS Coordinates you able to check latitude and longitude of any location.

By using GPS Route Finder you can able to check shortest distance between any two locations.

title: Gather: Easy Group Video Chat
description: We‚Äôve found ourselves suddenly isolated from friends and family members but craving social connection that we used to take for granted. Gather is the simplest way to get your crew together--with just one tap, you all can get back to the brunches, happy hours, book clubs, or random Wednesday night hangouts-on-the-couch you‚Äôre missing. Hangouts are great for one-on-ones, Zoom‚Äôs great for meetings--we tried to create an app made just for social gatherings, with a focus on simplicity. That way, you can spend less time figuring out how to get everyone on a video chat and more time actually talking.

description:
SuperPhone helps you build better relationships by making sure you have a current cell number for everyone in your network, including:

- Your followers
- Your family
- Your friends
- Your fans
- Your supporters
- Your collaborators
- Your mentors
- Your advisors
- Your investors
- Your colleagues
- Your customers
- Your students
- Your congregation

SuperPhone enhances your relationships by tracking your texting and calling. Every day, the people with whom you communicate will accumulate points for every interaction. This results in a SuperPhone score that tells you how close you are to the people in your world. To increase your score with a contact, simply reach out more often.

SuperPhone also allows businesses of all types to communicate (via SMS and Facebook Page messenger) with their customers via our Shopify integration.

Quick and Easy Setup

Get up and running in minutes.

Complete Solution.

comments: It doesn't show contact names anymore. When I open the app it shows the contacts for a second and then only shows the phone number anymore! But the app definitely has access to the contacts and uses it, because I can type in the contact name in the search function and it shows me the threats!

This HTC text message app hasn't really changed since the first HTC I bought 10 years ago. Works fine, it should after years of use with no real feature updates, but it just lacks some basic features and options. I currently use the Pulse messaging app, but there are many with different looks and feel. Don't be afraid to delete the HTC app and use another. You can always reinstall if you want, but I don't think you will after trying something more modern...

Not impressed with this app from HTC. No thread view background wallpaper option. No black theme for us night owls. Doesn't disable notifications completely (can still read full message from drop down notification bar), even when disabled. Doesn't allow automatic link previews. Having to use another sms app. On the plus side, I love the phone U11 üòçüì±
Won't open, keeps giving an error message since the update.

My favorite messaging app so far. The ability to delete messages by selection is a basic ability, yet Android Messages can't do it. Themeing works well, and secure box is useful. Overall fantastic. Please don't abandon this Sense app like you are with all the other Sense apps!

title: Messenger SMS & MMS
description:
Messenger SMS & MMS is an instant messaging app for android. Its a great Messaging app.
Fully customizable by you! Send 3000+ new emojis, funny faces, stickers, GIFs &text messages via SMS messages. Sending funny SMS messages. Sending picture, audio, video MMS messages to share the amazing moment. Sending GIFs and emoji messages to express yourself better. A funny SMS messages app to replace stock messages app!

Messenger SMS & MMS: Send messages safely with private box, SMS blocker, even SMS backup & restore and schedule SMS.
Texting SMS messages has never been so great with countless emoji, GIF, sticker, theme, private box, SMS blocker, SMS backup & restore and schedule SMS! Enjoy sending & blocking text messages with funny SMS messages.

Messenger SMS & MMS Key Features:
-Backup & Restore
+ Backup SMS & MMS messages to cloud, messages never get lost
+ Restore deleted or lost SMS & MMS message whenever
- Caller ID
+ Identify numbers in real time - even those not in your contact list
+ Get warnings for more than 1 million spam numbers worldwide
- Calls with Messages
+ One click text a contact after each call. No need to input number again
+ Access other Messages features directly from caller ID screen
- Schedule SMS
+ Delayed SMS message give opportunity to correct the wrong message
+ Never miss any big moment with schedule SMS Messages
- Private Box
+ Encrypt messages or contacts & lock down with private box
+ Hide private box icon to protect privacy from being snooped
- SMS Blocker
+ No worry about spam messages consume storage space with blocker
+ Block text messages via adding to SMS blocker
- Free Funny sms collection
+ 20+ categories SMS messages you can choose
+ Love SMS, flirt SMS, romantic SMS, friendship SMS, greeting SMS and more
- Funny Emoji Message
+ Fast text 5000+ funny face, emoji & emoticons from messages directly
+ Great display of funny face, emoji & emoticons in text message
- Funny Messages:
+ Messages support all new funny emoji & funny face in SMS
+ Support update multiple emoji in SMS
+ Support Unicorn, Middle Finger, Taco Rainbow and more funny emoji
- Free Animated GIF & Emoji ART
+ Share thousands of trending hot GIFs MMS via MMS
+ Share unique Emoji Art & funny face with friends via SMS
- Customization SMS Themes
+ Tons of amazing messaging themes
+ Customize SMS background as you wish
- Messages Customization
+ Customize texting bubble, SMS bubble, color, font & wallpaper
+ Take photo as wallpaper or choose wallpaper from photo gallery
- Auto reply messages:
+ Driving Mode disable message notifications from messages or stock messages except phone call
+ Auto Reply when Driving Mode is turned on, keep distractions to a minimum
- MORE FEATURES
+ Send picture, audio, video MMS messages to more than one friends for once time
+ Clipboard for multiple fast copy and paste text messages
+ Pop up new message for a quick view and quick reply
+ Quick search to find exactly what you are looking for in free text messages
+ Custom bubble themes.
+ Support all emojis, send and receive emoji with your friend.
+ Custom font for conversation list, thread, popup message dialog.
+ Beautiful popup message dialog, support more pages popup dialog.
+ Blink LED when new message arrived.

23 Rosecrans Ave, Suite 200
El Segundo, CA 90245. USA
recentChanges: update new designer
comments: This is a good app, and it definitely has potential! However, I am disappointed with the following; (too many ads) that there is no remove ads with purchase option, when you lock an SMS convo with a passcode by tapping on the unlocked padlock icon - it prompts you to set a password. You have to enter this password everytime to see the conversation. My issue is that there is no "permanent" unlock the convo feature after it's been locked. I'll rate 5 stars when the developer fixes these issues.

Its perfect for keeping in contact with my son while hes gone and thats so awesome 5 stars for me. I wish you could add the feature screen share while on facetime so that the both people can watch a movie together while on facetime. That would be so great if they could add that cus I had it for my LG G5 but my Samsung A70 doesnt have this feature and its newer phone so Im confused. Anyways my point is that its amazing and great in everyway. Its awesome for when they are away from Home

Response to message doesnt work. Message sent but still says sending. Contact name doesn't show for some contacts but when pressing the number, the info shows that it actually is a saved contact. No delayed sending option. No pin to top option. Really no options other than customization. Uninstalling. Going back to the stock messaging app.

A super clean, beautiful interface w/ optional themes available at your disposal. Nothing to cluttered or clunky either, as it's all very well optimized. No lag. No annoying plug-ins/extensions or integrated ads planted within the interface. Ultimately a great app with no nonsense from the dev's. Definitely a step up from the native stock app on my S9+. Gripes: Photos are organized by album rather than date. Ads Redundant emoji button. We already have one. Contacts don't update quickly.

I love this app. It does everything that I need it to do. But I have to comment on these stupid huge emojis that keep popping up. They are pissing me off because they keep popping up when Im trying to text and I keep hitting them. Please get rid of them. Other thank that its great I can talk to my kids that are to young for an actual phone.üòÅ Its the only app I use for video chatting. And sometimes I completely forget that I cant call people on my phone and just use the app instead.

title: Neveo ‚Äì Family Photo Album
description:
Send a printed photo album to your parents or grandparents every month. Add your favorite photos and invite other family members to add their pictures. We print and deliver your album to your recipient's doorstep.
More than 100,000 families have already created their photo albums. Why don‚Äôt you?

‚ùñ How it works ‚ùñ
- ¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†Download our app and create your account
- ¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†Add your photos to the album: You can add pictures until the last day of each month
- ¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†Add captions to your photos: not mandatory, but it adds a nice touch to your album ;-)
- ¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†Ask your family to participate: brothers, sisters... Invite anyone who could add great pictures
- ¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†Pick a plan that suits you best and submit your photo album

On the last day of every month, we collect all the albums and automatically format, print and ship your albums.
From now on, all you need to do is add your photos and captions and remind your family members to do the same. You‚Äôre all set! 

‚ùñ Why create a family photo album ‚ùñ
At Neveo, we believe that photos build family ties. There‚Äôs proof: everyone loves looking at their photo albums to remember all the good times.

But we also know that life gets busy and we often don't take the time to print photos (of our children, our trips...) and send them to our parents.
The Neveo family album is the best way to share your favorite moments with your family. Seeing your amazing memories printed out in a real photo album is magical. 

‚ùñ Why choose Neveo ‚ùñ
1) ¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†Because we‚Äôre a nice bunch ;-)
2) ¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†Because our app is super easy to use
3) ¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†Because we‚Äôre meticulous about the quality of your album
4) ¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†Because with us you can cancel anytime for free
5) ¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†Because we regularly remind you to add your photos to make sure you‚Äôre loved ones don‚Äôt miss out

‚ùñ Who we are ‚ùñ 

We come from very different backgrounds, but we all noticed the same thing: we let ourselves get caught up in our jobs and daily routines without taking the time to share important moments in our lives with our loved ones. The idea of creating a simple way to send photos to our parents and grandparents is what brought us together. So we designed and developed Neveo as a way to easily recreate the photo albums that we all know from our childhood.

We‚Äôre passionate about our cause and hope that it will help more families reconnect with each other through their photos.
Your satisfaction is extremely important to us, which is why you can always reach us at hello@neveo.com. We make sure to get back to you within 24 hours. You can also get in touch through our chat. 
Follow us on Facebook and Instagram to see beautiful stories from other Neveo families

Talk soon

The Neveo team: Simon, Vincent and Jerome

comments: I love this! My grandma lives in Canada and doesn't use the internet or have a smartphone, so I wasn't able to easily share pictures with her. This makes it do easy! And she raves about it. It's better than just sending pictures because the captions make the pics more interesting. I've been using this for the past year and can't say enough good things! Just remember to add your pics by the end if the month! Only thing I wish is that I could easily make an exact copy to send to myself.

I love this service. It's a great concept for expats. My parents love it. However, the app doesn't work well. Just like for the other user, I am not able to go past the window to rate the app until I force quit the app and restart it. It's quite frustrating.

Love the app. Doesn't seem to work so well on my new Oppo phone though. I have a subscription but I still get notifications to by a subscription or photos won't be sent - I still get charged though. Also with oppo the photos get rolled over to the next month. I find I need to go onto the website with my laptop to manage it

First of all you're charging me for this and I've never once used it. Second of all I never remember signing up. Third, when I go into the app it makes me rate and won't go past that screen. if it's not fixed and I don't get my photo albums that I've paid for, I'm going to dispute the charges. Is completely useless if you can't even open the app to get your pictures in book
Super nice, it's easy to use and my Grandma is beyond happy when she receives her album! Thank you for making my Grandma feel like she's part of the everyday life of her grandchildren!

title: SMS from Android 4.4 with Caller ID
description:
The ultimate SMS and text message app that is conversational and simple, with a clean texting interface for SMS messages - the way apps used to be. 

Powerful and advanced features let the app identify the numbers of message senders and callers, even if they are not in your phone book, so you always know who is calling or writing to you.

SMS from Android 4.4 is built to give you a smoother, better, faster, and cleaner Android communication experience. Send text messages, pictures, recordings and much more. The app delivers text messages directly via the mobile network, so no Internet or Wi-Fi connection is needed*.

With this smart message app, you will never have to do more than click a button to identify an unknown number from an SMS or phone call. The Caller ID screen after each call displays information on who is calling, even if they are not in your phonebook. This way, you can avoid spam calls and easily save new contacts to your phonebook with just one click. 

SMS app features:

‚úÖ	Totally free to download
‚úÖ	Unlimited: Works across virtually all Android devices
‚úÖ	Offline messages: No Internet or Wi-Fi connection needed to send SMS messages*
‚úÖ	Multi-format messaging: Send SMS, pictures and videos instantly
‚úÖ	Voice messages: Record your voice and send it as an attachment
‚úÖ	SMS messages: One click to text a contact after each call. No need to input number again
‚úÖ	Number Search: Search for unknown numbers from texts, directly from the inbox
‚úÖ	Caller ID: Identify numbers in real-time ‚Äì even those not in your contact list

*Your service provider may charge you for sending offline SMS messages depending on your contract with them. Please check with you service provider regarding any charges you may receive.

comments: Wow, can't see how things always get messed up when updating. The last 2 updates now DON'T ALLOW YOU TO SELECT DIFFERENT NUMBER IN A CONTRACT. It seems to always select the home phone number rather then the mobile number. Can't get around it. Even put in the contrasts cell number. Send a text, and then started a new text typing the name in. Still selects the home number rather then the mobile. FIX IT!!!! FIX IT!!!! FIX IT!!!!!!
Last 'upgrade' has hosed the functionality. Removed itself from home screen, removed tone setting, and can't text more than one person at a time now.
I just updated your app, and now all of a sudden i'm unable to send texts. It tells me wrong number format. What gives!!??
Correction to earlier review. This mornings update also makes it so my texts aren't actually sending and I'm not receiving texts either. This is not good for my small business.
Very bad app, and sometimes its laging.

title: Aetonix aTouchAway Mobile
description:
The aTouchAway app is a mobile communications platform designed for healthcare professionals and care members seeking to dramatically improve the efficiency ratio and communication between clients and their circle of care.
With the aTouchAway; the circle of care members and home-care clients can easily communicate with one another across our secure, mobile communications platform. Home-care clients easily and efficiently communicate to their care members and professionals through secure video conferencing and sharing of their unique care plan information.
 
Benefits & Capabilities...

- Overall Better Client Experience & Outcome: aTouchAway significantly increases the overall care experience of the client and reduces readmission rates.

- Access Real-Time Care Plan Information: With aTouchAway, all care plan information can be easily accessed and shared by clients and care members.

-Access Client Metrics & History: Review client metrics in an organized, real-time platform.

- Secure Video, Picture & Text Communications: Connect clients, family, or care members instantly through secure mobile communications.

- Dramatically Increase Patient Care Efficiency: aTouchAway dramatically increases the efficiency ratio between clients and care members.

- Keep Family Close: With aTouchAway, clients can easily stay connected with their loved ones when they need them most through video or text communications.

- And Much More!

title: Firefox Browser: fast, private & safe web browser
description:
Firefox Browser for Android is automatically private and incredibly fast. Thousands of online trackers are following you every day, collecting information about where you go online and slowing down your speed. Firefox blocks over 2000 of these trackers by default and there are ad blocker add-ons available if you want to customize your browser even more. With Firefox, you‚Äôll get the security you deserve and the speed you need in a private, mobile browser. 

FAST. PRIVATE. SAFE.
Firefox is faster than ever and gives you a powerful web browser that protects your privacy. Keep what‚Äôs personal private with Enhanced Tracking Protection, which automatically blocks over 2000 online trackers from invading your privacy. With Firefox, you don‚Äôt have to dig in your privacy settings, everything is set up automatically, but if you like to be in control, you can choose from the many ad blocker add-ons available for the browser. We designed Firefox with smart browsing features that let you take your privacy, passwords, and bookmarks with you safely wherever you go.

ENHANCED TRACKING PROTECTION AND PRIVACY CONTROL
Firefox gives you greater privacy protection while you‚Äôre on the web. Block third-party cookies and unwanted ads that follow you around the web with Enhanced Tracking Protection. Search in Private Browsing mode and you won‚Äôt be traced or tracked ‚Äî your private browsing history is automatically erased when you're done.

OWN YOUR LIFE WHEREVER YOU INTERNET
- Add Firefox across your devices for secure, private and seamless browsing. 
- Sync your devices to take your favorite bookmarks, saved logins and browsing history wherever you go. 
- Send open tabs between mobile and desktop.  
- Firefox makes password management easy by remembering your passwords across devices. 
- Take your internet life everywhere, knowing that your personal data is safe, never sold for profits.

SEARCH INTELLIGENTLY & GET THERE FASTER
- Firefox anticipates your needs and intuitively provides multiple suggested and previously-searched results across your favorite search engines. Every time.
- Easily access shortcuts to search providers including Wikipedia, Twitter and Amazon.

NEXT LEVEL PRIVACY
- Your privacy has been upgraded. Private Browsing with Tracking Protection blocks parts of Web pages that may track your browsing activity.

INTUITIVE VISUAL TABS
- Open as many tabs as you like without losing track of your open Web pages.

EASY ACCESS TO YOUR TOP SITES
- Spend your time reading your favorites sites instead of looking for them.

GET ADD-ONS FOR EVERYTHING
- Take control of your mobile browser by personalizing Firefox with add-ons like ad blockers, password and download managers and more. Want a more personalized browser? Add-ons can help you customize your browser to make your time online safer. 

QUICK SHARE
- The Firefox web browser makes it easy to share links to web pages or specific items on a page by connecting to your most recently used apps like Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, WhatsApp, Skype and more.

TAKE IT TO THE BIG SCREEN
- Send video and Web content from your smartphone or tablet to any TV equipped with supported streaming capabilities.

Learn more about Firefox for Android:
- Have questions or need help? Visit https://support.mozilla.org/mobile
- Read about Firefox permissions: https://mzl.la/Permissions
- Follow Firefox on Twitter: https://mzl.la/FXTwitter

ABOUT MOZILLA
Mozilla exists to build the Internet as a public resource accessible to all because we believe open and free is better than closed and controlled. We build products like Firefox to promote choice and transparency and give people more control over their lives online. Learn more at https://www.mozilla.org

Privacy Policy: https://www.mozilla.org/legal/privacy/firefox.html

title: Viasat Browser
description:
Experience a new kind of web browser and help build a smarter internet that refuses to accept the limitations of today. The Viasat Browser learns how to make web pages faster, blocks ads that degrade the experience, and includes a suite of security and privacy features for a more private and safer web browsing experience.
 
Faster web browsing
 
We made a faster browser by thinking about the web differently. Already faster than leading browsers, our innovative technology learns how to browse faster the more you use it.
 
A smarter browser for the evolving internet
 
Viasat built a smarter way to surf the web. Using artificial intelligence, we rethought how browsers work and invented new technology that figures out how to load web pages faster.
 
A safe browser to protect your privacy & data
 
Built upon Chromium, Viasat Browser harnesses the enormous energy of the open source community that is focusing on making the web a safer place for everyone. In addition, web surfing is made more secure by preventing malware and internet trackers from loading.
 
A browser that helps reduce data usage
 
We know how annoying wasting data can be. The Viasat Browser was built to help this. Our ad-blocker stops unwanted ads from loading, and a built in Data Saver Mode blocks audio and video HTML5 streams from pre-loading and auto-playing so that you don‚Äôt consume data for content that you don‚Äôt want to see.
 
The more everyone uses it, the faster it gets
 
Viasat Browser is the first browser to crowdsource the internet so that together, we can make it better for everyone. As the community grows, it gets faster and smarter so that together we make a faster Internet.

About Viasat: Viasat Inc. is a global communications company that believes everyone and everything in the world can be connected. We‚Äôre developing the ultimate communications network to power high-quality, secure, affordable, fast connections to impact people‚Äôs lives anywhere.

To learn more about the Viasat Browser and its features, please visit https://browser.viasat.com
 
Support: Please visit https://browser.viasat.com/faq.html

Our ad-blocker stops unwanted ads from loading, and a built in Data Saver Mode blocks audio and video HTML5 streams from pre-loading and auto-playing so that you don‚Äôt consume data for content that you don‚Äôt want to see.

The more everyone uses it, the faster it gets

Viasat Browser is the first browser to crowdsource the internet so that together, we can make it better for everyone. As the community grows, it gets faster and smarter so that together we make a faster Internet.

About Viasat: Viasat Inc. is a global communications company that believes everyone and everything in the world can be connected. We‚Äôre developing the ultimate communications network to power high-quality, secure, affordable, fast connections to impact people‚Äôs lives anywhere.

To learn more about the Viasat Browser and its features, please visit https://browser.viasat.com

Support: Please visit https://browser.viasat.com/faq.html
summary: Faster. More Private. Saves Data.

title: Fonoma
description:

It will take less than a minute to send a recharge, in 3 very simple steps.

1 - Choose a contact from your cell phone or enter a new number.
2 - Choose how much balance you want to send.
3 - Pay securely with your credit / debit card or PayPal account.

title: FinalsClub
description:
What is FinalsClub?
We're a group messaging service built specifically for college students!
We provide group chats for every class, organization and residence hall at Rutgers. Rather than passing around a phone on the first day of class, users can sign up with their Rutgers email and join the group chat we already created for them!

Our goal is to facilitate communication between students, without the hassle of manually creating a group chat. We streamline the process of working with others by making it easy to communicate- anytime, anywhere.

What we stand for:

Staying anonymous:
We never reveal your true identity to Rutgers staff or administrators. We want to make students feel like they can say anything and everything about their professors and the university at large without any repercussions.

Convenience:
It's always a difficult process to try to make one group chat for everyone in the class. We wanted to make it easier for you and your peers to talk online. Now all you have to do is sign in with your Rutgers email and start chatting.

We're universal:
We provide group chats for EVERY SINGLE one of your courses and sections. This means even if you're taking an obscure elective, you can still talk to your classmates about upcoming projects or homework.

title: Text Reader: Text to Voice
description:
Do you wish someone reads the letters, news, text files, books, etc, for you ? 
This app does exactly that for you. It reads everything that you give to it. Open a text file to read or a PDF file. You can also copy any language text and paste it in app to read it loud. 

Main Features:

- Text to speech (voice). Reads for you.
- You can play and pause reading anytime.
- Multi language support. (Read in almost any language of your choice.)
- Control the speed and sound of the speech in settings.
- Read from text files or PDF files. Works like book reader.
- Copy and paste text to read.
- Edit your text easily.
- Save text files
- Save as audio file ti listen in future, 
- Share text or audio (speech) on socila media.
- Helpful for visually impaired people.
- Helpful for speech impaired people. ( they could type let some read their thoughts)



Note: This e Reader or app needs Text-to-Speech engine for speech to work. Incase your phone does not have pre-installed you could download it from google play store.

Enjoy this free sticker app with hundreds of cute stickers! Send a romantic love emoji, or stickers of hearts, congratulate with the birthday and send beautiful flowers, or just good morning or good night. FAQs

How to add stickers to (WAStickerApps)

1. Tap the "+" icon next to the stickers category you want to add and confirm.
2. Open New Emoji Stickers - New WAStickerapps, tap the emoji icon in the left corner and then tap the sticker icon at the bottom. Your stickers category will appear on the panel (after the clock and star icons).

How to remove stickers from (WAStickerApps)

1. Tap the emoji icon in the left corner and then tap the sticker icon at the bottom.
2. Tap the "+" icon shown on the right in all tabs of the label.
3. Tap the "My stickers" tab at the top and delete any category using the trash icon. If you delete it by mistake, you can always add a category of this type again from the New Emoji Stickers application.

If you enjoy our collection of stickers, send more of our stickers to another through New Emoji Stickers - New WAStickerapps Thank you üòç

title: Ojooo App
description:
With Ojooo you can connect with other users for free. This cross-platform app supports HD audio and video. You can also chat and create group chats up to 100 participants.
To call non-Ojooo landline or mobile phone numbers buy one of the minute plans or just use our "pay as you go" attractive rates.
On Ojooo, your phone number is your ID. Those from your contacts who are already Ojooo users are automatically detected.

Main features:
- free audio and video calls to other Ojooo users - HD quality,
- PUSH notifications - never miss calls, even if your app is closed,
- voicemail with e-mail delivery,
- virtual phone numbers - get phone numbers from more than 60 countries,
- minute plans and attracive pay as you go rates.

With our support you will create your own professional website for any kind of company or undertaking. An easy to use wizard allows you to build everything from ready-made components. You have at your disposal templates for a variety of industries.

Be a part of the Ojooo community!
Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/OjoooMail/
Learn more about Ojooo at: https://ojooo.com

title: SMS from PC / Tablet & Sync Text from Computer
description:
SMS Text Messaging done easier, faster, & better!

Send SMS & MMS text messages from your PC, Mac, or Tablet without touching your Android phone.

Named one of Time Magazine's "Best 50 Android Apps"

As seen on TechCrunch, Washington Post, Business Insider, Engadget, PC World, Lifehacker, VentureBeat, PC World, All Things Digital & more.

Save time; Increase productivity. Don't check your phone for every SMS notification! See who's texting you from your PC or Tablet without having to look at your phone's messaging app.

 
Great for online texting when busy working or in meetings. Manage your texts, picture messages (MMS) & see Caller ID of incoming phone calls without looking at your phone. Turn off incoming SMS notifications during presentations. Text meeting updates before leaving your desk. 


Perfect for real estate agents, sales people, freelancers, taxi dispatchers, event planners, and other businesses that rely on texting to send quick, professional bulk SMS messages to colleagues & clients. Text online from the comfort of your computer or tablet. 




Students love messaging & group texting (MMS) with friends discreetly Text online while in class "taking notes" on your laptop.



‚òÖ Text message from your PC, Mac, or Tablet sync‚Äôd with your Android phone number. Messages stay in sync with your phone's existing SMS messenger app.
‚òÖ Low Battery Alerts: See your phone's battery level on your desktop computer or tablet
‚òÖ Phone App Notifications on your laptop: Not just for your text message notifications! Get notifications from apps like Snapchat, WhatsApp & Uber - on your computer. Dismiss them from your PC or Mac as well
‚òÖ Schedule SMS Schedule Texts to send out in advance. (Schedule on your computer/tablet; text messages are sent from your phone)
‚òÖ SMS Backup & Restore: Backup your phone's text messages to MightyText and restore later to a new phone
‚òÖ Phone Call Alerts: See who's calling you on your computer/tablet. Missed calls & incoming calls stored to an online call log
‚òÖ Send Picture Messages from your PC: Integrate your desktop's photo library with your phone's messaging app via MMS
‚òÖ Contact Lists: Send bulk SMS messages to up to 25 contacts at once. Send as one group message or to individual contacts
‚òÖ Text free from Gmail on your PC: Send text messages directly from Gmail or Facebook on your computer (Chrome browser)
‚òÖ Our free online texting apps: WebApp, Desktop (Mac & Windows), Chrome Extension (for Notifications) & Gmail Chrome Extension. Coming soon: SMS from iPad
‚òÖ Block Numbers: Block text messages from unwanted numbers!
‚òÖ Text Message Templates: Sending the same content over and over? Set up SMS Templates to save time
‚òÖ SMS ‚Üî Email Sync: Send and reply to text messages from your email inbox
‚òÖ Priority Ringer: Ring your phone remotely, even if your notification sounds are off by letting your trusted friends/family text a special keyword.


By clicking "Install" you agree to these Terms of Service: https://mightytext.net/tos

Android & Chrome are trademarks of Google Inc.

developerAddress:
444 Castro Street, Suite 1200
Mountain View, CA 94041
comments: Been using Mighty Text for about three months now and am very happy with every aspect of it. Does exactly what you need it to do without the other party having it installed on their devices. Being able to make, reply or just monitor incoming phone texts while on the computer keyboard is much more convenient and faster for these old fingers than trying to do a long text on the phone keypad. Will be upgrading to Mighty Text Pro in the near future. Very well behaved program that does NOT interfere with the normal operation of other computer programs in anyway. Bob

There is no obvious way to stop the annoying reminder that covers the bottom right of the screen to say I have not checked in. I know that; tell me once, but then stop the constant reminders! No matter how many times I close the reminder, it comes back. There are programs that need that real estate, and the reminder is a problem. It also does not go away when you check into the program.

I have been using this app with windows and linux OS's for a number of years. I just upgraded my phone to a Galaxy S10 and it works well, actually better than with the S6. I like that it also works with my tablet. I recommend it for people who do not like tapping on screens, the amount of data for the free version is a bit limited, otherwise it's great.

I have been using the Mac version for several years and I am very pleased with it. For the last year or so I have also been using iPad (beta) version which I find even more useful ‚Äî as I always have my iPad with me. The great thing about this app (for me) is that I can read and send SMS from the app ‚Äî this even works when I leave my phone at home (so long as the phone is connected to the internet). My phone battery is old (like me) so having the ability to receive and send SMS when I am out of the house ‚Äî when the phone is at home charging is a boon for me.

Boy, I see all the good reviews and wonder. I bought the full version and at least once a week it breaks and I have to either unlink the phone or reinstall the app. It also randomly won't send texts from the computer. I'm moving on very soon

TOO many issues especially with purchasing. Sometimes I get what I paid for and other times I don't. And when I ask for it to be fixed, it never gets done. CUSTOMER SUPPORT (x2) STILL HASN'T FIXED THE ISSUE! BUT YOURE GOING TO EAT UP MY MONEY!

I paid for totalwireless service my phone broke I bought a Verizon phone I had it unlocked I then put my sim card in my new phone I activated my total services it worked fine now I'm having problems I can't make calls text or receive them

Great way to keep track of the phone plan that I've

title: SMS Auto Reply Text Message / SMS Autoresponder
description:
SMS Auto Reply - automatic reply with text / sms message to INCOMING TEXTS when you are busy, away, in a meeting, in school, on vacation, on leave, out of office. And also while you are driving, watching a movie, sleeping, or just when you would prefer not to be disturbed. Auto Reply to WhatsApp, WA Business,  Facebook , Google Voice Number could be added through the app menu.

Do you want to enjoy your holiday without getting disturbed all the time? Set easily automatic replies messages on your cell phone for any occasion and don't be disturbed any more when you're busy or away. You can choose between an elaborated answer or simply a short answer as "text me later". 

What our android app has to offer:
‚úî Setup multiple profiles for text / SMS auto reply (one for driving, one for sleeping, one for class etc).
‚úî Customize reply messages
‚úî Personalized list - people whom you want to auto reply with personalized message
‚úî Reply only to personalized list 
‚úî Don't Auto Reply list - a list of people whose texts / sms, you won‚Äôt reply to
‚úî auto reply to texts / sms only of your contacts 
‚úî auto reply to texts / sms only of non-contacts 
‚úî Set ringer mode to silent during sms auto reply mode
‚úî Set vibrate mode to silent during sms auto reply mode 
‚úî Each profile have its own settings (vibrate for meeting, totally silent while sleeping etc)
‚úî Recurring auto reply text activated at a specific day and time on a scheduled basis.
‚úî Option to set time, weekdays, repeat weekly
‚úî Send only one response to the same contact during auto replay mode
‚úî Archive of sent text messages
‚úî Uses virtually no battery power, CPU time and RAM
‚úî Widget - short info + indicator

 Reply with MMS
MMS ARE NOT SUPPORTED, so images, videos, audio, other media files cannot be sent. 

You can anytime purchase extended functionality

‚úî Remove Ads
‚úî Manual status ‚Äì set default status and turn it on/off manually	
‚úî TTS ‚Äì Text to speech service for incoming messages
‚Ä¢	Read out incoming messages aloud\n when they arrive 
‚Ä¢	Adjust Reading speed
‚Ä¢	Read incoming messages without reply

‚úî Set alarm for the end of the status ‚Äì good for ‚Äúsleeping‚Äù status
and more

comments: I love this app!! It's not exactly plug'n'play to use...but it's worth it. So pay attention to the instructions and if it doesn't seem to work then persist. The developers have done a great job of streamlining it to make it straightforward step by step but there are definitely things you have to attend to.

Galaxy Note 10, February 24th 2020 Installed, works as expected, except when I manually turn it off, I have to manually turn up my notification sound. If I were designing the app I would not make the user have to go through this extra step. The good news is that if I let it complete the silenced period so that it turns itself back on, it re-enables the notification sound.

A truly used to love and rely on this app. for some reason now everytime I choose a contact to send the text to it randomly chooses a different contact. I would give this app five stars if it would just send the reminder text to the right text. like I said I love this app and relied on it for over a year before. It even looks different on my old phone so I don't know if I just didn't update it and the updates to problem but got any suggestions please help

I'm pretty fond of this app. I bought the extra feature so I can use it for my FB Messenger as well, and it really helps me focus at school because I know if something's urgent people will call, and if not the person knows WHY I'm silent for so long. I do wish that changing the time on an auto reply actually just changed the time, though, rather than making a whole new auto reply. That part is irritating.

This is a good app! I watched a movie and the lead actress is using this app and i kept on wondering what's the name of that app. Luckily i bumped into this. I can easily schedule my reply msgs to be sent at the time when I am busy or doing something. Would definitely recommend this app.

title: Cake Web Browser-Free VPN, Fast, Private, Adblock
description:
Cake is a next-generation web browser with built-in VPN that protects your privacy and provides the best search and web browsing experience available for mobile. Cake is designed to help you find answers FAST.

üõ°Ô∏èFREE, UNLIMITED VPN
Protect and secure your data with Cake‚Äôs free, worldwide VPN. Our VPN provides military-grade encryption without tracking, throttling, or bandwidth restrictions empowering you to search with peace of mind.

üëâSWIPE THROUGH SEARCH RESULTS
No more jumping back-and-forth between the search results page and each website. Skim the search results, tap and swipe, or just swipe right into results - you are in control. Experience the best way to search the web on your phone.

üîíPRIVACY PROTECTION
Cake is serious about your privacy. Unlike other browsers, Cake doesn‚Äôt ask for your name or email and doesn‚Äôt tie any search terms or website visits to you or any other user. Cake was thoughtfully designed to protect your privacy and still give you a great experience searching and browsing the web.

Go 100% incognito and search without a trace in ‚ÄúPrivate Mode‚Äù ‚Äì unlike ‚Äúprivacy‚Äù mode in other mainstream browsers, Cake DOES NOT collect your anonymous browsing history on our servers! 

Additional privacy features:
‚Ä¢	Anonymous Browsing
‚Ä¢	Private Tab Time Bomb
‚Ä¢	Passcode Protection
‚Ä¢	Https Everywhere
‚Ä¢	Do Not Track
‚Ä¢	Ad & Tracker Blocking

üåôDARK MODE
Reduce eye-strain and increase battery life by switching to Dark Mode. Set it to automatically integrate with your system settings or setup the feature within Cake.

üé§VOICE SEARCH
We all know typing on a mobile phone isn‚Äôt fun. Just tap the microphone and tell Cake what you‚Äôre searching for. It‚Äôs great for one-handed browsing - simply say it and swipe.

üõëAD AND TRACKER BLOCKING
ANNOYING ADS ARE A THING OF THE PAST
Block annoying ads and pop-ups, reduce data consumption, and speed up your experience with Cake‚Äôs best-in-class ad blocking technology. Cake automatically blocks annoying and disruptive ads like pop-ups, video ads, banner ads, and ads disguised as content. Occasionally, you may see some ads that aren‚Äôt disruptive. These ads help support great content creators. You can choose to block these ads, too, by turning off the Acceptable Ads feature in settings.

üîéFIND MORE WITH GROUP SEARCH
Enter your search and then swipe through results from multiple online search services. Get the best the web has to offer in videos, images and shopping.

üôã‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èTODAY ON THE INTERNET
See what‚Äôs new and fun on the internet today. Cake brings you the delight of discovery with a unique feed of videos, images, news, inspiration, products and more.

üîñSWIPE THROUGH BOOKMARK COLLECTIONS
Stop retrieving bookmarks one-by-one! In Cake, simply swipe through your bookmarked sites and organize them into Collections.

üñåÔ∏èCUSTOMIZE YOUR APP ICON
Personalize your Cake app icon (yeah, you can do that!). Choose from a library of icons to display on your home screen dock.

‚úèÔ∏èFIND ON PAGE + SWIPE
Find and highlight specific terms within a webpage to save time while searching. CAKE BONUS: Swipe between pages to see your term highlighted across MULTIPLE search results!

üí∞SAVE MONEY WITH RAKUTEN CASH BACK
Earn money when you shop with Cake. Powered by Rakuten (formerly Ebates), Cake alerts you with deals and discounts as you browse, making it easy to earn cash back for purchases you make. Talk about a sweet deal!

ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏èWHAT ARE YOU WAITING FOR?
Take the Cake challenge! Put Cake in your dock for 1 week and see how it compares to your current web browser‚Äîwe bet you‚Äôll never go back!

Discover more: https://cakebrowser.com/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/thecakebrowser/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/cakebrowser/
Feedback & Support: feedback@cakebrowser.com
Privacy policy: https://cakebrowser.com/privacy/
Terms & Conditions: https://cakebrowser.com/terms/

comments: Great browser for millennials, as it looks like its intended audience. The swipe to search feature is definitely helpful! There are a couple rendering issues when switching apps and video pages sometimes don't load or disappear upon rendering. It would also be nice to add auto-complete and search for bookmarks on the search bar. A speed dial for bookmarks would also be a well appreciated feature! Other then that it is a fantastic browser in progress!

I really enjoyed the user interface & design of cake, like the ads say, it is a browser designed for phones and the free VPN is a nice touch. However, it is extremely slow. I have just ran a speed test with cake & chrome. Cake came out at 38kbs and chrome 29mbs! It's a shame the speed can't be quicker, because it's an awesome browser! Please fix guys! üôè

4.1 stars is spot on, I like it! I like how the Cake browser blocks ads, everything would be perfect. Except it has it's kinks. It freezes sometimes whenever I try to open it on multi-window, (Chrome works fine in 1/4 view, 1/2 & 3/4, but no option for add blocking. I know ads help pay for websites, but I'm a Christian male who happens to be human, I'm flawed, I don't like to see certain ads that remind me of said flaws)

The feature to swipe left/right between favorites should be something you can TURN OFF, but you have no control over it. I find it to be obnoxious and useless to accidentally open the same two "favorites" again and again and again when I'm working within my 1 frequented favorite, especially since one has had a safety cert expire. I'm uninstalling the app and giving it 2 stars. Fix this problem, please.

This app truely amazing, but it does not preload pages the way it claims it does, thus losing a star. This app does not keep your device on when watching a video, though, and you may need to watch videos elsewhere. The design of Cake is great, and it keeps your identity secure. I have not seen a single add yet, which is incredible, and I find this app great for research. I highly recommend this to you, and hope this was helpful.

title: JusTalk - Free Video Calls and Fun Video Chat
description:
JusTalk is a FREE high-quality video, voice and group calling app for everyone - simple, reliable, secure and fun, so you never miss a moment.

WHY USE JUSTALK:

Free Calls
Make free HD-quality voice or video calls over Wi-Fi or on-the-go (2.5G/3G/4G/5G)*.

Make Calls a Lot More Fun
Doodle, recording lively voice or video calls, play games, send stickers, share photos, and more all in one voice or video call!

Say More Than Texts
Send and receive pictures, voices, videos, location, stickers, GIFs, and more 1:1 or in groups.

Group Voice Call And Video Chat (meetings)
Create as many groups as you like to make group voice calls or group video chats with family, friends or coworkers up to 16 people. Enjoy high quality audio and super high definition video calls. Easily control the group call (mute, block new participants or remove attendees, enlarge anyone‚Äôs screen). Simultaneously send group text, images, and videos.

Out Call
Make international calls with Out Call at low calling rates. Using cheap cost Out Call to reach your friends anytime even when they‚Äôre offline.

Live Video
Start a live video chat to share your moments with your loved ones during voice call. 

Cross-platform
Video chat all your friends across any types of smartphones & tablets with just one simple app.

And Much More
Create your own unique JusTalk ID and make your friends easy to search for your account. Add new friends by shared name cards or QR code. Bluetooth auto connect supported. Choose themes (light & dark modes) and express yourself musically with ringtones.

Private and Secure
All information and calls are end-to-end encrypted so that information and call data are split into multiple random path. It ensures that calls can‚Äôt be monitored or saved by servers.

*Data charges may apply. Check with your carrier for details.

--------------------------------------------------------------
We're always excited to hear from you! Please feel free to contact us via:

Email: support@justalk.com

Instagram: @justalk_app

Facebook: @justalkapp

Twitter: @JusTalkApps
---------------------------------------------------------------

The following is a more detailed description:

Free Phone Calls
Superior crystal-clear audio and high quality internet calling app, totally free HD video calls* and live chat video. The line in JusTalk is always unblocked. 

Group Video Calling App & Group Messenger
Experience life events with your family & friends together on JusTalk with no distance no matter you‚Äôre at the commencement, celebrating a Christmas house party and so on.

Capture the Moment
Quickly snap a photo or video and save these to camera roll or send to chats.

Online Meetings
Make a conference call or group calls, with voice or video calling. It's not just a free calling app, but a free cloud meeting app for team collaboration as well. JusTalk helps you create a real group face time with your colleagues.

Address Book Integration
Easily invite and add your friends to JusTalk by syncing your phone contacts or login with Facebook account. You can send an invitation to your friends by SMS, Mail, social networks, etc.

Free Texting
Can't take the call? Respond with a free text messaging.  
Call declined? Send a private text with all the important details directly.

Interactive Video Features
Top voip free calling apps, you can also tell short stories to your loved one by sharing story pictures.

Low Data Usage
Save 40-90% of the voip or vowifi network traffic during realtime video calling with 720P HD quality. Like a fun video walkie talkie.

Block Strangers
Block calls easily, just add the unwanted number or caller id to your blacklist.

comments: Used to be my go to app for calls with family and friends. However, after the last update, I cannot connect my Bluetooth headphones to the app any more. Everytime I make call the app would switch from Bluetooth to speaker as soon as my call was answered. Please fix this issue! I'm bound to use other apps with mediocre calling experience until this issue is fixed.

Its agood app really really fun and enjoyable I'm pretty sure a couple updates and it would be great I mean you can text ,call,play games!!I love it it's such a good idea for when you are waiting for a friend to come back and you can just play a game or draw while you wait!!!its such a great app it definitely deserves the hype it doesn't get!!!!!ü¶Ñ‚ù§‚ù§üëâüëà‚ù§‚ù§ü¶Ñ

This is one great app for sharing moments with your loved ones when you cant be there with them . great video quality but cant talk on mic because of major feed back from back ground noise . if this could be elevatied it would be great .

title: TrueConf Free 4K Video Calls
description:
Free video calls, video conferencing and chat on Android smartphones and tablets! TrueConf enhances collaborative efficiency in your business workflow.

‚Ä¢ One click sign up with Facebook, Twitter, Google and other social media accounts.
‚Ä¢ Quick authorization via e-mail.
‚Ä¢ No ads: nothing will distract you from communication.
‚Ä¢ Free video calls and video conferences 3x3: communicate on Android, iOS, Windows, macOS and Linux platforms.
‚Ä¢ Group video conferencing with up to 120 participants (PRO plan).
‚Ä¢ Group and personal chats are available during video calls and group video conferencing.
‚Ä¢ Slideshow support in video calls and group conferences.
‚Ä¢ Invite friends by SMS, e-mail, and social networks.
‚Ä¢ Automatic synchronization of Facebook contacts with TrueConf Address Book.
‚Ä¢ Mobile app runs on 3G, 4G and Wi-Fi networks.
‚Ä¢ Delivery of unsent text messages after reconnecting to the Internet.
‚Ä¢ Backlit from the rear camera (make video calls even in the darkness).
‚Ä¢ Supports Google Cardboard for 3D video conferencing, if your companion has a stereo camera.
‚Ä¢ Make calls to SIP/H.323 endpoints (TrueConf Server).

Helpful hints:
‚Ä¢ You can evaluate the performance of your phone or tablet on the "About" page.
‚Ä¢ You can set the bandwidth in the application to improve connection stability.
‚Ä¢ If you are using Wi-Fi, configuring the router to a free channel can improve the video call quality.
‚Ä¢ Got slow Internet? Disable video and use your device as a phone.
‚Ä¢ The Anti-flickering filter will suppress the camera flickering.
‚Ä¢ Get the beta versions of the app ‚Äî https://play.google.com/apps/testing/com.trueconf.videochat
‚Ä¢ Check our Youtube channel for tips https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC8ayWJXiOvlXd0a3_nMaHXg

Corporate users can organize video conferences in private networks with TrueConf Server running on MS Windows Server, increasing the communication security and improving the connection quality on mobile applications.

Download the free TrueConf application and start communicating today!

Need more information on our video conferencing solution? Contact us at mobile@trueconf.com or call us at TrueConf ID support@trueconf.com.

Learn more at https://trueconf.com 
Watch us on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/trueconf
Follow us on Twitter at https://twitter.com/trueconf

title: iAdvize
description:
If you are a member of a brand community or a customer service agent, you can now advise online shoppers on your brand's website at any time, whether you're at home, on public transport or enjoying some downtime. 
 
With iAdvize for Android, you can: 
- chat with users on the website of a brand  
- get notified when you receive a new message or a new conversation  
- browse ongoing conversations  
- measure your impact on visitor satisfaction and monitor the evolution of chat conversations you can handle 
- if you're a member of a brand community, you can also interact in real-time with other experts using the livefeed  
 
iAdvize is a messaging application that allows professional agents or members of a brand community to chat with website visitors in real-time and offer them assistance.  
To use this app, members need to be invited or approved by the brand.

- browse ongoing conversations

- if you're a member of a brand community, you can also interact in real-time with other experts using the livefeed

To use this app, members need to be invited or approved by the brand.

title: Pingtumi
description:
Pingtumi is a mobile broadcast messaging service that enables any business, organization or individual to message large groups using push notifications. 

WHY USE PINGTUMI

If you are a business or organization that needs to capture the immediate attention of your customers, Pingtumi is the perfect solution for you. Instead of investing in app development or gathering thousands of mobile numbers to send text messages, you can have your customers subscribe to your notification feed on Pingtumi.

If you are a consumer and you are tired of receiving annoying push notifications that miss the mark, subscribe to specific notifications on Pingtumi and only receive the notifications you care about.

PRIVACY

We respect your privacy. To use Pingtumi, you don't have to disclose your personal mobile number.  We believe your mobile number is private and that only you should control who has access to it. When your subscribers create an account on Pingtumi, they can subscribe to your notifications using their account username.

TITLES

Each notification you create belongs to a title. We do this to signal intent so your subscribers know in advance what to expect from your notifications. This ensures that they only receive notifications they're interested in. Say goodbye to annoying spam messages or irrelevant notifications cluttering your home screen.

MULTIMEDIA

Looking to grab the attention of your subscribers? No need to limit your notifications to written text. With Pingtumi, you can personalize your notifications by adding audio, video maps or images. 

SCHEDULING

Unlike other messaging services that force you to send your message immediately or save as a draft for future distribution, Pingtumi provides a variety of scheduling options. Send your message immediately or schedule by time or location. To schedule by location, create geofences around venues of interest. Your notification will be automatically triggered when subscribers enter or leave your geofence.

CUSTOMIZATION

Pingtumi also enables you to tag incoming notifications with custom sounds. If you've subscribed to many notifications, you can create a custom sound for each notification title. When the notification arrives, your custom sound will play so you'll know who it's coming from.

PINGTUMI FOR BUSINESSES, ORGANIZATIONS AND PUBLIC GROUPS

Mark your notification as public and:

‚òÖ Provide directions to attendees of your event, meetup or conference.
‚òÖ Notify your students of important class announcements.
‚òÖ Drive return visits to your website and grow your online business.
‚òÖ Encourage customers to visit your store when they‚Äôre nearby.
‚òÖ Alert prospective buyers to your new real estate listing.
‚òÖ Schedule private reminders so you don‚Äôt forget important events.

PINGTUMI FOR INDIVIDUALS AND PRIVATE GROUPS

Mark your notification as private and:

‚òÖ Remind friends and relatives of important events.
‚òÖNotify your party or wedding guests about changes in the location or time of the event.
‚òÖCommunicate cancellation of the little league baseball game to parents.
‚òÖ Schedule personal reminders such as remembering to take your medication or take out the trash.


For more information, please visit us at:
www.pingtumi.com

Or send us a message at:
contact@pingtumi.com

Or install Pingtumi and subscribe to our notification feed at:
@pingtumi

We look forward to your comments and suggestions.

Team Pingtumi
